[Bud]100-bud , aw'm mista'en if [yah]3541-ye shew [yer]3541-ye sperrit lang . Will [Hathecliff]1322-he bide [sich]3546-sich bonny ways , think [ye]3541-ye ? Aw nobbut wish [he]1322-he muh cotch [ye]3541-ye [i]45-joseph ' that plisky . Aw nobbut wish [he]1322-he may . "[45-joseph] And so [he]1322-he went scolding to [[his]1322-he den]858-his den beneath , taking the candle with [him]1322-he , and [I]0-i remained in the dark . The period of reflection succeeding this silly action , compelled [me]0-i to admit the necessity of smothering [my]0-i pride , and choking [my]0-i wrath , and bestirring [myself]0-i to remove its effects . An unexpected aid presently appeared in the shape of [Throttler]123-throttler , whom [I]0-i now recognised as [a son of [[our]1325-our old Skulker]1326-our old skulker]1324-a son of our old skulker ; it had spent its whelphood at [the Grange]73-mr. linton , and was given by [[my]0-i father]338-my father to [Mr. Hindley]75-hindley . [I]0-i fancy it knew [me]0-i — it pushed its nose against [mine]0-i by way of salute , and then hastened to devour the porridge , while [I]0-i groped from step to step , collecting the shattered earthenware , and drying the spatters of milk from the bannister with [my]0-i pocket - handherchief . [Our]1325-our labours were scarcely over when [I]0-i heard [Earnshaw]75-hindley 's tread in [the passage]1078-the passage ; [[my]0-i assistant]1329-my assistant tucked in [his]75-hindley tail , and pressed to the wall ; [I]0-i stole into the nearest doorway . The dog 's endeavour to avoid [him]75-hindley was unsuccessful ; as [I]0-i guessed by a scutter down stairs , and a prolonged , piteous yelping . [I]0-i had better luck . [He]75-hindley passed on , entered [[his]75-hindley chamber]505-his chamber , and shut the door . Directly after [Joseph]45-joseph came up with [Hareton]47-hareton , to put [him]47-hareton to bed . [I]0-i had found shelter in [[Hareton]47-hareton 's room]1331-hareton 's room , and [the old man]2774-the old man on seeing [me]0-i , said — " [They]3547-they 's rahm fur boath yah , un [yer]0-i pride , nah , aw sud think [i]2774-the old man ' th hahse . It 's empty ; [yah]0-i muh [hev]3548-hev it all tuh yerseln , un [Him]47-hareton as allas maks a third , [i]2774-the old man ' sich ill company ! "[2774-the old man] Gladly did [I]0-i take advantage of this intimation ; and the minute [I]0-i flung [myself]0-i into a chair , by the fire , [I]0-i nodded , and slept . [My]0-i slumber was deep , and sweet ; though over far too soon . [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff awoke [me]0-i ; [he]43-heathcliff had just come in , and demanded , in [his]43-heathcliff loving manner , what [I]0-i was doing [there]2637-there ? [I]0-i told [him]43-heathcliff the cause of [my]0-i staying up so late — that [he]43-heathcliff had the key of [[our]1334-our room]1335-our room in [his]43-heathcliff pocket . The adjective [our]1334-our gave mortal offence . [He]43-heathcliff swore it was not , nor ever should be [mine]0-i ; and he'd — but [I]0-i 'll not repeat [his]43-heathcliff language , nor describe [his]43-heathcliff habitual conduct ; [he]43-heathcliff is ingenious and unresting in seeking to gain [my]0-i abhorrence ! [I]0-i sometimes wonder at [him]43-heathcliff with an intensity that deadens [my]0-i fear : yet , [I]0-i assure [you]1336-you , a tiger , or a venomous serpent could not rouse terror in [me]0-i equal to that which [he]43-heathcliff wakens . [He]43-heathcliff told [me]0-i of [Catherine]56-catherine 's illness , and accused [[my]0-i brother]2672-my brother of causing it ; promising that [I]0-i should be [Edgar]81-edgar 's proxy in suffering , till [he]2672-my brother could get a hold of [him]81-edgar . ⁠"I do hate [him]43-heathcliff — [I]82-isabella am wretched — [I]82-isabella have been [a fool]3336-a fool ! Beware of uttering one breath of this to [any one at the Grange]3550-any one at the grange . [I]82-isabella shall expect [you]1336-you every day — don't disappoint [me]82-isabella ! "[82-isabella] [ISABELLA]82-isabella . " As soon as [I]82-isabella had perused this epistle , [I]82-isabella went to [the master]430-the master , and informed [him]430-the master that [[his]430-the master sister]577-his sister had arrived at [the Heights]568-the heights , and sent [me]82-isabella a a letter expressing [her]1338-her sorrow for [Mrs. Linton]48-mrs. linton 's situation , and [her]1338-her ardent desire to see [him]430-the master ; with a wish that [he]430-the master would transmit to [her]1338-her , as early as possible , some token of forgiveness by [me]82-isabella . "[82-isabella] Forgiveness ? " said [Linton]81-edgar . "[82-isabella] [I]0-i have nothing to forgive [her]1338-her , [Ellen]80-ellen — [you]80-ellen may call at [Wuthering Heights]11-wuthering heights this afternoon , if [you]80-ellen like , and say that [I]0-i am not angry , but [I]0-i 'm sorry to have lost [her]1338-her : especially as [I]0-i can never think [she]1338-her 'll be happy . It is out of the question [my]0-i going to see [her]1338-her , however ; [we]1339-we are eternally divided ; and should [she]1338-her really wish to oblige [me]0-i , let [her]1338-her persuade [the villain [she]1338-her has married]1340-the villain she has married to leave [the country]438-the country . " "[0-i] And [you]0-i wo nt write [her]1338-her a little note , [sir]2571-sir ? " [I]0-i asked , imploringly . "[0-i] No , " [he]2571-sir answered . "[0-i] It is needless . [My]0-i communication with [[Heathcliff]43-heathcliff 's family]1343-heathcliff 's family shall be as sparing as [his]43-heathcliff with [mine]0-i . It shall not exist ! " [Mr. Edgar]91-edgar 's coldness depressed [me]1344-i exceedingly ; and all the way from [the Grange]73-mr. linton , [I]1344-i puzzled [my]1344-i brains how to put more heart into what [he]2571-sir said , when [I]1344-i repeated it ; and how to soften [his]2571-sir refusal of even a few lines to console [Isabella]82-isabella . [I]1344-i dare say [she]1338-her had been on the watch for [me]1344-i since morning : [I]1344-i saw [her]1338-her looking through the lattice , as [I]1344-i came up [the garden causeway]3554-the garden causeway and [I]1344-i nodded to [her]1338-her ; but [she]1338-her drew back , as if afraid of being observed . [I]1344-i entered without knocking . There never was such a dreary , dismal scene as [the formerly cheerful house]3555-the formerly cheerful house presented ! [I]1344-i must confess that , if [I]1344-i had been in [[the young lady]276-the young lady 's place]3557-the young lady 's place , [I]1344-i would , at least , have swept the hearth , and wiped the tables with a duster . But [she]1338-her already partook of the pervading spirit of neglect which encompassed [her]1338-her . [Her]1338-her pretty face was wan and listless ; [her]1338-her hair uncurled ; some locks hanging lankly down , and some carelessly twisted round [her]1338-her head . Probably [she]1338-her had not touched [her]1338-her dress since yester evening . [Hindley]75-hindley was not [there]2637-there . [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff sat at a table , turning over some papers in [his]43-heathcliff pocket - book ; but [he]43-heathcliff rose when [I]1344-i appeared , asked [me]1344-i how [I]1344-i did , quite friendly , and offered [me]1344-i a chair . [He]43-heathcliff was the only thing there that seemed decent , and [I]1344-i thought [he]43-heathcliff never looked better . So much had circumstances altered [their]3559-their positions , that [he]43-heathcliff would certainly have struck [a stranger]2580-a stranger as [a born and bred gentleman]3561-a born and bred gentleman , and [[his]43-heathcliff wife]2670-his wife as [a thorough little slattern]3563-a thorough little slattern ! [She]2670-his wife came forward eagerly to greet [me]1344-i ; and held out one hand to take the expected letter . [I]1344-i shook [my]1344-i head . [She]2670-his wife would n't understand the hint , but followed [me]1344-i to a sideboard , where [I]1344-i went to lay [my]1344-i bonnet , and importuned [me]1344-i in a whisper to give [her]2670-his wife directly what [I]1344-i had brought . [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff guessed the meaning of [her]2670-his wife manœuvres , and said — "[1344-i] If [you]1344-i have got anything for [Isabella]82-isabella , as no doubt [you]1344-i have , [Nelly]80-ellen , give it to [her]82-isabella . [You]1344-i need n't make a secret of it ; [we]1345-we have no secrets between [us]1345-we . " "[1344-i] Oh , [I]0-i have nothing , " [I]1344-i replied , thinking it best to speak the truth at once . "[1344-i] [[My]0-i master]530-my master bid [me]0-i tell [[his]530-my master sister]577-his sister that [she]577-his sister must not expect either a letter or a visit from [him]530-my master at present . [He]530-my master sends [his]530-my master love , [ma'am]3167-ma'am , and [his]530-my master wishes for [your]1344-i happiness , and [his]530-my master pardon for the grief [you]1344-i have occasioned ; but [he]530-my master thinks that after this time , [[his]530-my master household]1349-his household , and [the household]227-the household [here]2574-here , should drop intercommunication ; as nothing good could come of keeping it up . [Mrs. Heathcliff]48-mrs. linton 's lip quivered slightly , and [she]48-mrs. linton returned to [her]48-mrs. linton seat in the window . [[Her]48-mrs. linton husband]2614-her husband took [his]2614-her husband stand on the hearthstone , near [me]0-i , and began to put questions concerning [Catherine]56-catherine . [I]0-i told [him]2614-her husband as much as [I]0-i thought [proper]1353-proper of [her]56-catherine illness , and [he]2614-her husband extorted from [me]0-i , by cross - examination , most of the facts connected with its origin . [I]0-i blamed [her]56-catherine , as [she]56-catherine deserved , for bringing it all on [herself]56-catherine ; and ended by hoping that [he]2614-her husband would follow [Mr. Linton]73-mr. linton 's example , and avoid future interference with [[his]2614-her husband family]2781-his family , for good or evil . " [Mrs Linton]48-mrs. linton is now just recovering , "[0-i] [I]0-i said , " [she]48-mrs. linton 'll never be like [she]48-mrs. linton was , but [her]48-mrs. linton life is spared , and if [you]2614-her husband really have a regard for [her]48-mrs. linton , [you]2614-her husband 'll shun crossing [her]48-mrs. linton way again . Nay [you]2614-her husband 'll move out of [this country]3564-this country entirely ; and that [you]2614-her husband may not regret it , [I]0-i 'll inform [you]2614-her husband [Catherine Linton]56-catherine is as different now , from [[your]2614-her husband old friend]3565-your old friend [Catherine Earnshaw]54-catherine , as [that young lady]448-that young lady is different from [me]0-i ! [Her]56-catherine appearance is changed greatly , [her]56-catherine character much more so ; and [the person]3173-the person , who is compelled , of necessity , to be [[her]56-catherine companion]3030-her companion , will only sustain [his]3173-the person affection hereafter , by the remembrance of what [she]56-catherine once was , by common humanity , and a sense of duty ! "[0-i] " That is quite possible , "[43-heathcliff] remarked [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff forcing [himself]43-heathcliff to seem calm , " quite possible that [[your]2614-her husband master]3179-your master should have nothing but common humanity , and a sense of duty to fall back upon . But do [you]2614-her husband imagine that [I]43-heathcliff shall leave [Catherine]54-catherine to [his]3179-your master duty and humanity ? and can [you]2614-her husband compare [my]43-heathcliff feelings respecting [Catherine]54-catherine , to [his]3179-your master ? Before [you]2614-her husband leave [this house]2583-this house , [I]43-heathcliff must exact a promise from [you]2614-her husband , that [you]2614-her husband 'll get [me]43-heathcliff an interview with [her]54-catherine — consent , or refuse , [I]43-heathcliff will see [her]54-catherine ! What do [you]43-heathcliff say ? "[43-heathcliff] " [I]0-i say [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff , "[0-i] [I]0-i replied , " [you]43-heathcliff must not — [you]43-heathcliff never shall through [my]0-i means . Another encounter between [you]43-heathcliff and [the master]430-the master , would kill [her]54-catherine altogether ! "[0-i] " With [your]0-i aid that may be avoided ; "[1355-i] [he]1355-i continued , " and should there be danger of such an event — should [he]430-the master be the cause of adding a single trouble more to [her]54-catherine existence — Why , [I]1355-i think , [I]1355-i shall be justified in going to extremes ! [I]1355-i wish [you]0-i had sincerity enough to tell [me]1355-i whether [Catherine]54-catherine would suffer greatly from [his]430-the master loss . The fear that [she]54-catherine would restrains [me]1355-i : and there [you]0-i see the distinction between [our]3572-our feelings — Had [he]430-the master been in [my]1355-i place , and [I]1355-i in [his]430-the master , though [I]1355-i hated [him]430-the master with a hatred that turned [my]1355-i life to gall , [I]1355-i never would have raised a hand against [him]430-the master . [You]0-i may look incredulous , if [you]0-i please ! [I]1355-i never would have banished [him]430-the master from [her]54-catherine society , as long as [she]54-catherine desired [his]430-the master . The moment [her]54-catherine regard ceased , [I]1355-i would have torn [his]430-the master heart out , and drank [his]430-the master blood ! But , till then , if [you]0-i do n't believe [me]1355-i , [you]0-i do n't know [me]1355-i — till then , [I]1355-i would have died by inches before [I]1355-i touched a single hair of [his]430-the master head ! "[1355-i] " And yet , [I]1358-i interrupted , [you]0-i have no scruples in completely ruining all hopes of [her]54-catherine perfect restoration , by thrusting [yourself]0-i in to [her]54-catherine remembrance , now , when [she]54-catherine has nearly forgotten [you]0-i , and involving [her]54-catherine in a new tumult of discord , and distress . "[1358-i] " [You]0-i suppose [she]54-catherine has nearly forgotten [me]1356-me ? "[1356-me] [he]1356-me said . " Oh [Nelly]80-ellen ! [you]0-i know [she]54-catherine has not ! [You]0-i know as well as [I]1356-me do , that for every thought [she]54-catherine spends on [Linton]56-catherine , [she]54-catherine spends a thousand on [me]1356-me ! At a most miserable period of [my]1356-me life , [I]1356-me had a notion of the kind , it haunted [me]1356-me on [my]1356-me return to [the neighbourhood]3573-the neighbourhood , last summer , but only [her]54-catherine own assurance , could make [me]1356-me admit the horrible idea again . And then , [Linton]56-catherine would be nothing , nor [Hindley]75-hindley , nor all the dreams that ever [I]1356-me dreamt . Two words would comprehend [my]1356-me future death and hell — existence , after losing [her]54-catherine would be hell . "[1356-me] Yet [I]0-i was [a fool]3336-a fool to fancy for a moment that [she]1358-i valued [Edgar Linton]81-edgar 's attachment more than [mine]0-i — If [he]81-edgar loved with all the powers of [his]81-edgar puny being , [he]81-edgar could n't love as much in eighty years , as [I]0-i could in a day . And [Catherine]56-catherine has a heart as deep as [I]0-i have ; [the sea]1359-the sea could be as readily contained in that horse - trough , as [her]56-catherine whole affection be monopolized by [him]81-edgar — Tush ! [He]81-edgar is scarcely a degree dearer to [her]56-catherine than [her]56-catherine dog , or [her]56-catherine horse — It is not in [him]81-edgar to be loved like [me]0-i , how can [she]56-catherine love in [him]81-edgar what [he]81-edgar has not ? " [Catherine]56-catherine and [Edgar]81-edgar are as fond of [each other]313-each other , as [any two people]3575-any two people can be ! "[82-isabella] cried [Isabella]82-isabella with sudden vivacity . " [No one]404-no one has a right to talk in that manner , and [I]82-isabella wo n't hear [[my]82-isabella brother]2672-my brother depreciated in silence ! "[82-isabella] " [[Your]82-isabella brother]3095-your brother is wondrous fond of [you]82-isabella too , is n't [he]3095-your brother ? "[43-heathcliff] observed [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff scornfully . " [He]3095-your brother turns [you]82-isabella adrift on [the world]267-the world with surprising alacrity . "[82-isabella] " [[My]82-isabella young lady]3319-my young lady is looking sadly the worse , for [her]3319-my young lady change of condition , "[82-isabella] [I]0-i remarked . "[0-i] " [I]43-heathcliff should guess it was [her]3319-my young lady own , "[43-heathcliff] said [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff . " [She]3319-my young lady degenerates into [a mere slut]3582-a mere slut ! [She]3319-my young lady is tired of trying to please [me]43-heathcliff , uncommonly early — [You'd]82-isabella hardly credit it , but the very morrow of [our]3583-our wedding , [she]3319-my young lady was weeping to go [home]239-home . However , [she]3319-my young lady 'll suit [this house]2583-this house so much the better for not being over nice , and [I]43-heathcliff 'll take care [she]3319-my young lady does not disgrace [me]43-heathcliff by rambling abroad . "[43-heathcliff] " Well , [sir]2571-sir ; "[82-isabella] returned [I]0-i , " [I]82-isabella hope [you]2571-sir 'll consider that [Mrs. Heathcliff]48-mrs. linton is accustomed to be looked after , and waited on ; and that [she]3319-my young lady has been brought up like [an only daughter whom every one]3587-an only daughter whom every one was ready to serve — [You]2571-sir must let [her]3319-my young lady have [a maid]3588-a maid to keep things tidy about [her]3319-my young lady , and [you]2571-sir must treat [her]3319-my young lady kindly — Whatever be [your]2571-sir notion of [Mr. Edgar]91-edgar , [you]2571-sir can not doubt that [she]3319-my young lady has a capacity for strong attachments or [she]3319-my young lady would n't have abandoned the elegancies , and comforts , and friends of [[her]3319-my young lady former home]3589-her former home , to fix contentedly , in such a wilderness as this , with [you]2571-sir . "[82-isabella] " [She]3319-my young lady abandoned [them]3590-them under a delusion ; "[1360-i] [he]1360-i answered , " picturing in [me]1360-i [a hero of romance]3591-a hero of romance , and expecting unlimited indulgences from [my]1360-i chivalrous devotion . [I]1360-i can hardly regard [her]3319-my young lady in the light of [a rational creature]3592-a rational creature , so obstinately has [she]3319-my young lady persisted in forming a fabulous notion of [my]1360-i character , and acting on the false impressions [she]3319-my young lady cherished . But at last , [I]1360-i think [she]3319-my young lady begins to know [me]1360-i — [I]1360-i do n't perceive the silly smiles and grimaces that provoked [me]1360-i , at first ; and the senseless incapability of discerning that [I]1360-i was in earnest when [I]1360-i gave [her]3319-my young lady [my]1360-i opinion of [her]3319-my young lady infatuation , and [herself]3319-my young lady — It was a marvellous effort of perspicacity to discover that [I]1360-i did not love [her]3319-my young lady . [I]1360-i believed at one time , no lessons could teach [her]3319-my young lady that ! aud yet it is poorly learnt ; for this morning [she]3319-my young lady announced , as a piece of appalling intelligence , that [I]1360-i had actually succeeded in making [her]3319-my young lady hate [me]1360-i ! A positive labour of [Hercules]128-hercules , [I]1360-i assure [you]3319-my young lady ! If it be achieved , [I]1360-i have cause to return thanks — Can [I]1360-i trust [your]3319-my young lady assertion , [Isabella]82-isabella , are [you]3319-my young lady sure [you]3319-my young lady hate [me]1360-i ? If [I]1360-i let [you]3319-my young lady alone for half - a - day , wo n't [you]3319-my young lady come sighing and wheedling to [me]1360-i again ? [I]1360-i dare say [she]3319-my young lady would rather [I]1360-i had seemed all tenderness before [you]3319-my young lady ; it wounds [her]3319-my young lady vanity to have the truth exposed . But , [I]1360-i do n't care who knows that the passion was wholly on one side , and [I]1360-i never told [her]3319-my young lady a lie about it . [She]3319-my young lady can not accuse [me]1360-i of showing a bit of deceitful softness . The first thing [she]3319-my young lady saw [me]1360-i do , on coming out of [the Grange]2656-the grange , was to hang up [her]3319-my young lady little dog , and when [she]3319-my young lady pleaded for it the first words [I]1360-i uttered , were a wish that [I]1360-i had the hanging of every being belonging to [her]3319-my young lady , except one : possibly , [she]3319-my young lady took that exception for [herself]3319-my young lady — But no brutality disgusted [her]3319-my young lady — [I]1360-i suppose , [she]3319-my young lady has an innate admiration of it , if only [[her]3319-my young lady precious person]3594-her precious person were secure from injury ! Now , was it not the depth of absurdity — of genuine idiocy , for [that pitiful slavish , mean - minded brach to dream that [I]1360-i could love [her]3319-my young lady]3595-that pitiful slavish , mean - minded brach to dream that i could love her ? Tell [[your]3596-your master]3179-your master , [Nelly]80-ellen , that [I]1360-i never , in all [my]1360-i life , met with such an abject thing as [she]3319-my young lady is — [She]3319-my young lady even disgraces the name of [Linton]82-isabella ; and [I]1360-i 've sometimes relented , from pure lack of invention , in [my]1360-i experiments on what [she]3319-my young lady could endure , and still creep shamefully cringing back ! But tell [him]3179-your master also , to set [his]3179-your master fraternal and magisterial heart at ease , that [I]1360-i keep strictly within the limits of the law — [I]1360-i have avoided , up to this period , giving [her]3319-my young lady the slightest right to claim a separation ; and what 's more , [she]3319-my young lady 'd thank [nobody]442-nobody for dividing [us]3599-us — if [she]3319-my young lady desired to go [she]3319-my young lady might — the nuisance of [her]3319-my young lady presence outweighs the gratification to be derived from tormenting [her]3319-my young lady ! "[1360-i] " [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff , "[0-i] said [I]0-i , " this is the talk of [a madman]3600-a madman , and [[your]43-heathcliff wife]2612-your wife , most likely is convinced [you]43-heathcliff are mad ; and , for that reason , [she]3319-my young lady has borne with [you]43-heathcliff hitherto : but now that [you]43-heathcliff say [she]3319-my young lady may go , [she]3319-my young lady 'll doubtless avail [herself]3319-my young lady of the permission — [You]43-heathcliff are not so bewitched [ma'am]3167-ma'am , are [you]43-heathcliff , as to remain with [him]3167-ma'am , of [your]43-heathcliff own accord ? "[0-i] " Take care , [Ellen]80-ellen ! "[0-i] " Put that down ! "[1363-i] [he]1363-i interrupted , perceiving [my]0-i intention to depart . " [You]545-child are not going yet — Come here now , [Nelly]80-ellen — [I]1363-i must either persuade , or compel [you]545-child to aid [me]1363-i in fulfilling [my]1363-i determination to see [Catherine]56-catherine , and that without delay — [I]1363-i swear that [I]1363-i meditate no harm ; [I]1363-i do n't desire to cause any disturbance , or to exasperate , or insult [Mr. Linton]73-mr. linton ; [I]1363-i only wish to hear from [herself]56-catherine how [she]56-catherine is , and why [she]56-catherine has been ill ; and to ask , if anything that [I]1363-i could do would be of use to [her]56-catherine . Last night , [I]1363-i was in [the Grange garden]3614-the grange garden six hours , and [I]1363-i 'll return [there]2637-there to - night ; and every night [I]1363-i 'll haunt [the place]188-the place , and every day , till [I]1363-i find an opportunity of entering . If [Edgar Linton]81-edgar meets [me]1363-i , [I]1363-i shall not hesitate to knock [him]81-edgar down , and give [him]81-edgar enough to ensure [his]81-edgar quiescence while [I]1363-i stay — If [[his]81-edgar servants]3617-his servants oppose [me]1363-i , [I]1363-i shall threaten [them]3617-his servants off with these pistols — But would n't it be better to prevent [my]1363-i coming in contact with [them]3617-his servants , or [[their]3617-his servants master]3618-their master . "[1363-i] [I]0-i protested against playing that treacherous part in [[[my]0-i employer]1366-my employer 's house]1367-my employer 's house ; and besides , [I]0-i urged the cruelty , and selfishness of [his]1366-my employer destroying [Mrs. Linton]48-mrs. linton 's tranquillity , for [his]1366-my employer satisfaction . " The commonest occurrence startles [her]48-mrs. linton painfully , "[0-i] [I]0-i said . " [She]48-mrs. linton 's all nerves , and [she]48-mrs. linton could n't bear the surprise , [I]43-heathcliff 'm positive — Don't persist , [sir]2571-sir ! or else , [I]43-heathcliff shall be obliged to inform [[my]43-heathcliff master]530-my master of [your]3619-you designs , and [he]530-my master 'll take measures to secure [[his]530-my master house]3060-his house and [its inmates]3623-its inmates from any such unwarrantable intrusions ! "[43-heathcliff] exclaimed [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff , " [you]3619-you shall not leave [Wuthering Heights]11-wuthering heights till to - morrow morning . [She]56-catherine thinks [you]3619-you are [all spies for [[her]56-catherine husband]2614-her husband]3626-all spies for her husband — Oh , [I]43-heathcliff 've no doubt [she]56-catherine 's in hell among [you]3619-you ! [I]43-heathcliff guess , by [her]56-catherine silence as much as any thing , what [she]56-catherine feels . [You]3619-you say [she]56-catherine is often restless , and anxious looking — is that a proof of tranquillity ? [You]3619-you talk of [her]56-catherine mind , being unsettled — How the devil could it be otherwise , in [her]56-catherine frightful isolation . And [that insipid , paltry creature attending [her]56-catherine from duty and humanity]3628-that insipid , paltry creature attending her from duty and humanity ! From pity and charity .
