[I]0-i 'm of [the busy world]4412-the busy world , and to [its]4412-the busy world arms [I]0-i must return . Go on . Was [Catherine]56-catherine obedient to [[her]56-catherine father]502-her father 's commands ? "[0-i] " [She]56-catherine was , "[240-the housekeeper] continued [the housekeeper]240-the housekeeper . " [Her]56-catherine affection for [him]502-her father was still the chief sentiment in [her]56-catherine heart ; and [he]502-her father spoke without anger ; [he]502-her father spoke in the deep tenderness of one about to leave [his]502-her father treasure amid perils and foes , where [his]502-her father remembered words would be the only aid that [he]502-her father could bequeath to guide [her]56-catherine . [He]0-i said to [me]240-the housekeeper , a few days afterwards , "[240-the housekeeper] [I]0-i wish [[my]0-i nephew]2069-my nephew would write , [Ellen]80-ellen , or call . Tell [me]0-i , sincerely , what [you]80-ellen think of [him]2069-my nephew — is [he]2069-my nephew changed for the better , or is there a prospect of improvement , as [he]2069-my nephew grows [a man]2653-a man ? " "[80-ellen] [He]2069-my nephew 's very delicate , [sir]2571-sir , " [I]2069-my nephew replied ; "[2069-my nephew] and scarcely likely to reach manhood ; but this [I]0-i can say , [he]2069-my nephew does not resemble [[his]2069-my nephew father]518-his father ; and if [Miss Catherine]56-catherine had the misfortune to marry [him]2069-my nephew , [he]2069-my nephew would not be beyond [her]56-catherine control , unless [she]56-catherine were extremely and foolishly indulgent . However , [master]2968-master , [you]2968-master 'll have plenty of time to get acquainted with [him]2069-my nephew , and see whether [he]2069-my nephew would suit [her]56-catherine — it wants four years and more to [his]2069-my nephew being of age . " [Edgar]91-edgar sighed ; and , walking to the window , looked out towards [Gimmerton Kirk]29-gimmerton kirk . It was a misty afternoon , but the February sun shone dimly , and [we]4414-we could just distinguish the two fir trees in [the yard]252-the yard , and the sparely scattered gravestones . "[0-i] [I]0-i 've prayed often , " [he]0-i half soliloquized , "[0-i] for the approach of what is coming ; and now [I]0-i begin to shrink , and fear it . [I]0-i thought the memory of the hour [I]0-i came down that [glen]2074-glen [a bridegroom]2075-a bridegroom , would be less sweet than the anticipation that [I]0-i was soon , in a few months , or , possibly , weeks , to be carried up , and laid in [[its]2074-glen lonely hollow]2076-its lonely hollow ! [Ellen]80-ellen , [I]0-i 've been very happy with [[my]0-i little [Cathy]56-catherine]2077-my little cathy . Through winter nights and summer days [she]56-catherine was a living hope at [my]0-i side — but [I]0-i 've been as happy musing by [myself]0-i among those stones , under [that old church]2078-that old church — lying , through the long June evenings , on the green mound of [[[her]56-catherine mother]1556-her mother 's grave]2080-her mother 's grave , and wishing , yearning for the time when [I]0-i might lie beneath it . What can [I]0-i do for [Cathy]56-catherine ? How must [I]0-i quit [her]56-catherine ? [I]0-i 'd not care one moment for [Linton]56-catherine being [[Heathcliff]43-heathcliff 's son]2081-heathcliff 's son ; nor for [his]43-heathcliff taking [her]56-catherine from [me]0-i , if [he]43-heathcliff could console [her]56-catherine for [my]0-i loss . [I]0-i 'd not care that [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff gained [his]43-heathcliff ends , and triumphed in robbing [me]0-i of [my]0-i last blessing ! But should [Linton]56-catherine be unworthy — only a feeble tool to [[his]2081-heathcliff 's son father]518-his father — [I]0-i can not abandon [her]56-catherine to [him]43-heathcliff ! And , hard though it be to crush [her]56-catherine buoyant spirit , [I]0-i must persevere in making [her]56-catherine sad while [I]0-i live , and leaving [her]56-catherine solitary when [I]0-i die . [Darling]154-darling ! [I]0-i 'd rather resign [her]56-catherine to [God]66-god , and lay [her]56-catherine in [the earth]247-the earth before [me]0-i . " "[0-i] Resign [her]56-catherine to [God]66-god , as it is , [sir]2571-sir , " [I]66-god answered , "[66-god] and if [we]2085-we should lose [you]2571-sir — which may [He]43-heathcliff forbid — under [His]43-heathcliff providence , [I]0-i 'll stand [[her]56-catherine friend]2906-her friend and [counsellor]2087-counsellor to the last . [Miss Catherine]56-catherine is [a good girl]2088-a good girl ; [I]0-i do n't fear that [she]56-catherine will go wilfully wrong ; and people who do [their]2089-their duty are always finally rewarded . " Spring advanced ; yet [[my]0-i master]530-my master gathered no real strength , though [he]530-my master resumed [his]530-my master walks in [the grounds]1585-the grounds , with [[his]530-my master daughter]4009-his daughter . To [her]56-catherine inexperienced notions , this itself was a sign of convalescence ; and then [his]43-heathcliff cheek was often flushed , and [his]43-heathcliff eyes were bright , [she]56-catherine felt sure of [his]43-heathcliff recovering . On [her]56-catherine seventeenth birthday , [he]43-heathcliff did not visit [the churchyard]4419-the churchyard , it was raining , and [I]0-i observed — "[0-i] [You]0-i 'll surely not go out to - night , [sir]2571-sir ? " [He]43-heathcliff answered — "[0-i] No , [I]0-i 'll defer it , this year , a little longer . " [He]43-heathcliff wrote again to [Linton]56-catherine , expressing [his]43-heathcliff great desire to see [him]43-heathcliff ; and , had [the invalid]3469-the invalid been presentable , [I]0-i 've no doubt [[his]43-heathcliff father]518-his father would have permitted [him]43-heathcliff to come . As it was , being instructed , [he]43-heathcliff returned an answer , intimating that [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff objected to [his]43-heathcliff calling at [the Grange]2656-the grange ; but [[his]43-heathcliff uncle]4030-his uncle 's kind remembrance delighted [him]43-heathcliff , and [he]43-heathcliff hoped to meet [him]4030-his uncle , sometimes , in [his]4030-his uncle rambles , and personally to petition that [[his]43-heathcliff cousin]4033-his cousin and [he]4030-his uncle might not remain long so utterly divided . That part of [his]43-heathcliff letter was simple , and , probably [his]43-heathcliff own . [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff knew [he]43-heathcliff could plead eloquently enough for [Catherine]56-catherine 's company , then — "[0-i] [I]0-i do not ask , " [he]0-i said , "[2095-you] that [she]2091-her may visit [here]2574-here ; but , am [I]0-i never to see [her]2091-her , because [[my]0-i father]338-my father forbids [me]0-i to go to [[her]2091-her home]2094-her home , and [you]2095-you forbid [her]2091-her to come to [mine]0-i ? Do , now and then , ride with [her]2091-her towards [the Heights]568-the heights ; and let [us]2097-us exchange a few words , in [your]2095-you presence ! [we]2097-us have done nothing to deserve this separation ; and [you]2095-you are not angry with [me]0-i — [you]2095-you have no reason to dislike [me]0-i — [you]2095-you allow [yourself]2095-you . [Dear uncle]2098-dear uncle ! send [me]0-i a kind note to - morrow ; and leave to join [you]2098-dear uncle anywhere [you]2098-dear uncle please , except at [Thrushcross Grange]73-mr. linton . [I]0-i believe an interview would convince [you]2098-dear uncle that [[my]0-i father]338-my father 's character is not [mine]0-i ; [he]338-my father affirms [I]0-i am [more [[your]2098-dear uncle nephew]2101-your nephew than [[his]338-my father son]475-his son]2100-more your nephew than his son ; and though [I]0-i have faults which render [me]0-i unworthy of [Catherine]56-catherine , [she]56-catherine has excused [them]2103-them , and , for [her]56-catherine sake , [you]2098-dear uncle should also . [You]2098-dear uncle inquire after [my]0-i health — it is better ; but while [I]0-i remain cut off from all hope , and doomed to solitude , or the society of [those who never did , and never will]2104-those who never did , and never will like [me]0-i , how can [I]0-i be cheerful and well ? " [Edgar]91-edgar , though [he]91-edgar felt for [the boy]2803-the boy , could not consent to grant [his]91-edgar request ; because [he]91-edgar could not accompany [Catherine]56-catherine . [He]91-edgar said , in summer , perhaps , [they]4426-they might meet : meantime , [he]91-edgar wished [him]91-edgar to continue writing at intervals , and engaged to give [him]91-edgar what advice and comfort [he]91-edgar was able by letter ; being well aware of [his]91-edgar hard position in [[his]91-edgar family]2781-his family . [Linton]56-catherine complied ; and had [he]91-edgar been unrestrained , would probably have spoiled all by filling [his]91-edgar epistles with complaints and lamentations ; but [[his]91-edgar father]518-his father kept a sharp watch over [him]91-edgar ; and , of course , insisted on every line that [[my]2098-dear uncle master]530-my master sent being shown ; so , instead of penning [his]91-edgar peculiar personal sufferings , and distresses , the themes constantly uppermost in [his]91-edgar thoughts , [he]91-edgar harped on the cruel obligation of being held asunder from [[his]91-edgar friend]3203-his friend and love ; and gently intimated that [Mr. Linton]73-mr. linton must allow an interview soon , or [he]91-edgar should fear [he]91-edgar was purposely deceiving [him]91-edgar with empty promises . [Cathy]56-catherine was [a powerful ally at [home]239-home]4431-a powerful ally at home : and , between [them]4433-them , [they]4433-them , at length , persuaded [[my]2098-dear uncle master]530-my master to acquiesce in [their]4433-them having a ride or a walk together , about once a week , under [my]2098-dear uncle guardianship , and on [the moors nearest [the Grange]73-mr. linton]4435-the moors nearest the grange ; for [June]155-june found [him]91-edgar still declining ; and , though [he]91-edgar had set aside , yearly , a portion of [his]91-edgar income for [[my]2098-dear uncle young lady]3319-my young lady 's fortune , [he]91-edgar had a natural desire that [she]3319-my young lady might retain , or , at least , return , in a short time , to [the house of [[her]3319-my young lady ancestors]4438-her ancestors]4437-the house of her ancestors ; and [he]91-edgar considered [her]3319-my young lady only prospect of doing that was by a union with [[his]91-edgar heir]4439-his heir ; [he]91-edgar had no idea that [the latter]2991-the latter was failing almost as fast as [himself]91-edgar ; nor had [any one]2573-any one , [I]2098-dear uncle believe ; [no doctor]4442-no doctor visited [the Heights]11-wuthering heights , and [no one]404-no one saw [Master Heathcliff]43-heathcliff to make report of [his]43-heathcliff condition , among [us]4444-us . [I]2098-dear uncle , for [my]2098-dear uncle part , began to fancy [my]2098-dear uncle forebodings were false , and that [he]91-edgar must be actually rallying , when [he]91-edgar mentioned riding and walking on [the moors]352-the moors , and seemed so earnest in pursuing [his]91-edgar object . [I]2098-dear uncle could not picture [a father]1672-a father treating [a dying child]4447-a dying child as tyrannically and wickedly as [I]2098-dear uncle afterwards learnt [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff had treated [him]91-edgar , to compel this apparent eagerness ; [his]91-edgar efforts redoubling the more imminently [his]91-edgar avaricious and unfeeling plans were threatened with defeat by death . Summer was already past its prime , when [Edgar]91-edgar reluctantly yielded [his]91-edgar assent to [their]2105-us entreaties , and [Catherine]56-catherine and [I]2098-dear uncle set out on [our]2105-us first ride to join [[her]56-catherine cousin]462-her cousin . "[2098-dear uncle] It was a close , sultry day ; devoid of sunshine , but with a sky too dappled and hazy to threaten rain ; and [our]2105-us place of meeting had been fixed at the guide - stone , by [the cross - roads]1540-the cross - roads . On arriving [there]2637-there , however , [a little herd - boy , despatched as a messenger]2108-a little herd - boy , despatched as a messenger , told [us]2105-us that — " [Maister Linton]51-maister [wer]2105-us just ut [this side th ' Heights]4449-this side th ' heights : and [he]51-maister 'd be mitch obleeged to [us]2105-us to gang on a bit further . "[2108-a little herd - boy , despatched as a messenger] " Then [Master Linton]73-mr. linton has forgot the first injunction of [[his]73-mr. linton uncle]4030-his uncle , "[0-i] [I]0-i observed : " [he]73-mr. linton bid [us]2105-us keep on [the Grange land]4451-the grange land , and here [we]2105-us are , off at once . "[0-i] " Well , [we]2110-we 'll turn [our]2110-we horses ' heads round , when [we]2110-we reach [him]2111-you , "[350-my companion] answered [[my]0-i companion]350-my companion , " [our]2110-we excursion shall lie towards [home]239-home . "[350-my companion] But when [we]2110-we reached [him]2111-you , and that was scarcely a quarter of a mile from [his]2111-you own door , [we]2110-we found [he]2111-you had no horse , and [we]2110-we were forced to dismount , and leave [ours]2110-we to graze . [He]2111-you lay on the heath , awaiting [our]2110-we approach , and did not rise till [we]2110-we came within a few yards . Then , [he]2111-you walked so feebly , and looked so pale , that [I]0-i immediately exclaimed — " Why , [Master Heathcliff]43-heathcliff , [you]2111-you are not fit for enjoying a ramble , this morning . How ill [you]2111-you do look ! "[0-i] [Catherine]56-catherine surveyed [him]2111-you with grief and astonishment ; and changed the ejaculation of joy on [her]56-catherine lips , to one of alarm ; and the congratulation on [their]2110-we long postponed meeting , to an anxious inquiry , whether [he]2111-you were worse than usual ? " No — better — better ! "[2111-you] [he]2111-you panted , trembling , and retaining [her]56-catherine hand as if [he]2111-you needed its support , while [his]2111-you large blue eyes wandered timidly over [her]56-catherine ; the hollowness round them , transforming to haggard wildness , the languid expression [they]2110-we once possessed . " But [you]2111-you have been worse , "[4033-his cousin] persisted [[his]2111-you cousin]4033-his cousin , " worse than when [I]4033-his cousin saw [you]2111-you last — [you]2111-you are thinner , and — "[4033-his cousin] " [I]2111-you 'm tired , "[2111-you] [he]2111-you interrupted , hurriedly . " It is too hot for walking , let [us]2110-we rest here . And , in the morning , [I]2111-you often feel sick — [papa]2871-papa says [I]2111-you grow so fast . "[2111-you] Badly satisfied , [Cathy]56-catherine sat down , and [he]2111-you reclined beside [her]56-catherine . " This is something like [your]2111-you paradise , "[56-catherine] said [she]56-catherine , making an effort at cheerfulness . " [You]2111-you recollect the two days [we]2110-we agreed to spend , in the place and way , each thought pleasantest ? This is nearly [yours]2111-you , only there are clouds ; but then , they are so soft and mellow , it is nicer than sunshine . Next week , if [you]2111-you can , [we]2110-we 'll ride down to [the Grange Park]4454-the grange park , and try [mine]2111-you . "[56-catherine] [Linton]56-catherine did not appear to remember what [she]56-catherine talked of ; and [he]2111-you had evidently great difficulty in sustaining any kind of conversation . [His]2111-you lack of interest in the subjects [she]56-catherine started , and [his]2111-you equal incapacity to contribute to [her]56-catherine entertainment were so obvious , that [she]56-catherine could not conceal [her]56-catherine disappointment . An indefinite alteration had come over [his]2111-you whole person and manner . The pettishness that might be caressed into fondness , had yielded to a listless apathy ; there was less of the peevish temper of [a child which frets and teases on purpose to be soothed]2113-a child which frets and teases on purpose to be soothed , and more of the self - absorbed moroseness of [a confirmed invalid]2114-a confirmed invalid , repelling consolation , and ready to regard the good - humoured mirth of [others]3719-others , as an insult . [Catherine]56-catherine perceived , as well as [I]0-i did , that [he]2111-you held it rather a punishment , than a gratification , to endure [our]2116-our company ; and [she]56-catherine made no scruple of proposing , presently , to depart . That proposal , unexpectedly , roused [Linton]56-catherine from [his]2111-you lethargy , and threw [him]2111-you into a strange state of agitation . [He]2111-you glanced fearfully towards [the Heights]568-the heights , begging [she]56-catherine would remain another half - hour , at least . " But , [I]56-catherine think , "[56-catherine] said [Cathy]56-catherine , " [you]2111-you 'd be more comfortable at [home]239-home than sitting here ; and [I]56-catherine can not amuse [you]2111-you to - day , [I]56-catherine see , by [my]56-catherine tales , and songs , and chatter ; [you]2111-you have grown wiser than [I]56-catherine , in these six months ; [you]2111-you have little taste for [my]56-catherine diversions now ; or else , if [I]56-catherine could amuse [you]2111-you , [I]56-catherine 'd willingly stay . "[56-catherine] " Stay to rest [yourself]2111-you , "[2111-you] [he]2111-you replied . " And , [Catherine]56-catherine , do n't think , or say that [I]2111-you 'm very unwell — it is the heavy weather , and heat that make [me]2111-you dull ; and [I]2111-you walked about , before [you]56-catherine came , a great deal , for [me]2111-you . Tell [uncle]1673-uncle , [I]2111-you 'm in tolerable health , will [you]56-catherine ? "[2111-you] " [I]3319-my young lady 'll tell [him]1673-uncle that [you]2111-you say so , [Linton]56-catherine . [I]3319-my young lady could n't affirm that [you]2111-you are , "[3319-my young lady] observed [[my]0-i young lady]3319-my young lady , wondering at [his]2111-you pertinacious assertion of what was evidently an untruth . " And be here again next Thursday , "[2111-you] continued [he]2111-you , shunning [her]3319-my young lady puzzled gaze . " And give [him]1673-uncle [my]2111-you thanks for permitting [you]56-catherine to come — [my]2111-you best thanks , [Catherine]56-catherine . And — and , if [you]56-catherine did meet [[my]2111-you father]338-my father , and [he]1673-uncle asked [you]56-catherine about [me]2111-you , do n't lead [him]1673-uncle to suppose that [I]2111-you 've been extremely silent and stupid — don't look sad and downcast , as [you]56-catherine are doing — he'll be angry . "[2111-you] " [I]56-catherine care nothing for [his]1673-uncle anger , "[56-catherine] exclaimed [Cathy]56-catherine , imagining [she]56-catherine would be [its object]2119-its object . " But [I]462-her cousin do , "[462-her cousin] said [[her]56-catherine cousin]462-her cousin , shuddering . " Do n't provoke [him]1673-uncle against [me]462-her cousin , [Catherine]56-catherine , for [he]1673-uncle is very hard . "[462-her cousin] " Is [he]1673-uncle severe to [you]462-her cousin , [Master Heathcliff]43-heathcliff ? "[0-i] [I]0-i inquired . " Has [he]1673-uncle grown weary of indulgence , and passed from passive , to active hatred ? "[0-i] [Linton]56-catherine looked at [me]0-i , but did not answer ; and , after keeping [her]56-catherine seat by [his]462-her cousin side , another ten minutes , during which [his]462-her cousin head fell drowsily on [his]462-her cousin breast , and [he]462-her cousin uttered nothing except suppressed moans of exhaustion , or pain , [Cathy]56-catherine began to seek solace in looking for bilberries , and sharing the produce of [her]56-catherine researches with [me]0-i : [she]56-catherine did not offer them to [him]462-her cousin , for [she]56-catherine saw further notice would only weary and annoy . " Is it half an hour now , [Ellen]80-ellen ! "[56-catherine] [she]56-catherine whispered in [my]0-i ear , at last . " [I]56-catherine ca n't tell why [we]4458-we should stay . [He]1673-uncle 's asleep , and [papa]2871-papa will be wanting [us]4458-we back . "[56-catherine] " Well , [we]4458-we must not leave [him]1673-uncle asleep , "[0-i] [I]0-i answered ; " wait till [he]1673-uncle wakes and be patient . [You]0-i were mighty eager to set off , but [your]0-i longing to see poor [Linton]56-catherine has soon evaporated ! "[0-i] " Why did [he]1673-uncle wish to see [me]56-catherine ? "[56-catherine] returned [Catherine]56-catherine . " In [his]1673-uncle crossest humours , formerly , [I]56-catherine liked [him]1673-uncle better than [I]56-catherine do in [his]1673-uncle present curious mood . It 's just as if it were a task [he]1673-uncle was compelled to perform — this interview — for fear [[his]1673-uncle father]518-his father should scold [him]1673-uncle . But , [I]56-catherine 'm hardly going to come to give [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff pleasure ; whatever reason [he]1673-uncle may have for ordering [Linton]56-catherine to undergo this penance . And , though [I]56-catherine 'm glad [he]1673-uncle 's better in health , [I]56-catherine 'm sorry [he]1673-uncle 's so much less pleasant , and so much less affectionate to [me]56-catherine . "[56-catherine] " [You]2121-you think [he]1673-uncle is better in health , then ? "[0-i] [I]0-i said . " Yes , "[2121-you] [she]2121-you answered ; " because [he]1673-uncle always made such a great deal of [his]1673-uncle sufferings , [you]0-i know . [He]1673-uncle is not tolerably well , as [he]1673-uncle told [me]2121-you to tell [papa]2871-papa , but [he]1673-uncle 's better , very likely . "[2121-you] " There [you]2121-you differ with [me]0-i , [Miss Cathy]56-catherine , "[0-i] [I]0-i remarked ; " [I]0-i should conjecture [him]1673-uncle to be far worse . "[0-i] [Linton]56-catherine here started from [his]2122-i slumber in bewildered terror , and asked if [any one]2573-any one had called [his]2122-i name . " No , "[56-catherine] said [Catherine]56-catherine ; " unless in dreams . [I]56-catherine can not conceive how [you]56-catherine manage to dose , out of doors , in the morning . "[56-catherine] " [I]2122-i thought [I]2122-i heard [[my]2122-i father]338-my father , "[2122-i] [he]2122-i gasped , glancing up to the frowning nab above [us]2124-we . " [You]4033-his cousin are sure [nobody]442-nobody spoke ? "[2122-i] " Quite sure , "[4033-his cousin] replied [[his]2122-i cousin]4033-his cousin . " Only [Ellen]80-ellen and [I]4033-his cousin were disputing concerning [your]56-catherine health . Are [you]56-catherine truly stronger , [Linton]56-catherine , than when [we]2124-we separated in winter ? If [you]56-catherine be , [I]4033-his cousin 'm certain one thing is not stronger — [your]56-catherine regard for [me]4033-his cousin — speak , are [you]56-catherine ? "[4033-his cousin] The tears gushed from [Linton]56-catherine 's eyes as [he]2122-i answered — " Yes , yes , [I]2122-i am ! "[2122-i] And , still under the spell of the imaginary voice , [his]2122-i gaze wandered up and down to detect [its owner]491-its owner . [Cathy]56-catherine rose . " For to - day [we]2124-we must part , "[56-catherine] [she]56-catherine said . " And [I]56-catherine wo n't conceal that [I]56-catherine have been sadly disappointed with [our]2124-we meeting , though [I]56-catherine 'll mention it to [nobody]442-nobody but [you]56-catherine — not that [I]56-catherine stand in awe of [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff ! "[56-catherine] " Hush , "[56-catherine] murmured [Linton]56-catherine ; " for [God]66-god 's sake , hush ! [He]2122-i 's coming . "[56-catherine] And [he]2122-i clung to [Catherine]56-catherine 's arm , striving to detain [her]56-catherine ; but , at that announcement , [she]56-catherine hastily disengaged [herself]56-catherine , and whistled to [Minny]134-minny , who obeyed [her]56-catherine like a dog . " [I]56-catherine 'll be here next Thursday , "[56-catherine] [she]56-catherine cried , springing to the saddle . " Good bye . Quick , [Ellen]80-ellen ! "[56-catherine] And so [we]2127-we left [him]2122-i , scarcely conscious of [our]2127-we departure , so absorbed was [he]2122-i in anticipating [[his]2122-i father]518-his father 's approach . " Before [we]2127-we reached [home]239-home , [Catherine]56-catherine 's displeasure softened into a perplexed sensation of pity and regret largely blended with vague , uneasy doubts about [Linton]56-catherine 's actual circumstances , physical and social ; in which [I]2122-i partook , though [I]2122-i counselled [her]56-catherine not to say much , for a second journey would make [us]2127-we better judges . [[My]2122-i master]530-my master requested an account of [our]2127-we on - goings : [[his]530-my master nephew]2067-his nephew 's offering of thanks was duly delivered , [Miss Cathy]56-catherine gently touching on the rest : [I]2122-i also , threw little light on [his]530-my master inquiries , for [I]2122-i hardly knew what to hide , and what to reveal . Seven days glided away , every one marking its course by the henceforth rapid alteration of [Edgar Linton]81-edgar 's state . The havoc that months had previously wrought , was now emulated by the inroads of hours . [Catherine]56-catherine , [we]2127-we would fain have deluded , yet , but [her]56-catherine own quick spirit refused to delude [her]56-catherine . It divined , in secret , and brooded on the dreadful probability , gradually ripening into certainty . [She]56-catherine had not the heart to mention [her]56-catherine ride , when [Thursday]156-thursday came round ; [I]2122-i mentioned it for [her]56-catherine ; and obtained permission to order [her]56-catherine out of doors ; for [the library]3270-the library , where [[her]56-catherine father]502-her father stopped a short time daily — the brief period [he]502-her father could bear to sit up , and [[his]502-her father chamber]505-his chamber had become [her]56-catherine whole world . [She]56-catherine grudged each moment that did not find [her]56-catherine bending over [his]502-her father pillow , or seated by [his]502-her father side . [Her]56-catherine countenance grew wan with watching and sorrow , and [[my]2122-i master]530-my master gladly dismissed [her]56-catherine to what [he]502-her father flattered [himself]502-her father would be a happy change of scene and society , drawing comfort from the hope that [she]56-catherine would not now be left entirely alone after [his]502-her father death . [He]502-her father had a fixed idea , [I]2122-i guessed by several observations [he]502-her father let fall , that as [[his]502-her father nephew]2067-his nephew resembled [him]502-her father in person , [he]502-her father would resemble [him]502-her father in mind ; for [Linton]81-edgar 's letters bore few , or no indications of [his]81-edgar defective character . And [I]2122-i through pardonable weakness refrained from correcting the error ; asking [myself]2122-i what good there would be in disturbing [his]502-her father last moments with information that [he]502-her father had neither power nor opportunity to turn to account . [We]4473-we deferred [our]4473-we excursion till the afternoon ; a golden afternoon of August — every breath from [the hills]2957-the hills so full of life , that it seemed whoever respired it , though dying , might revive . [Catherine]56-catherine 's face was just like the landscape — shadows and sunshine flitting over it , in rapid succession ; but the shadows rested longer and the sunshine was more transient , and [her]56-catherine poor little heart reproached itself for even that passing forgetfulness of its cares . [We]4473-we discerned [Linton]81-edgar watching at [the same spot [he]81-edgar had selected before]4475-the same spot he had selected before . [[My]2122-i young mistress]2005-my young mistress alighted , and told [me]2122-i that as [she]2005-my young mistress was resolved to stay a very little while , [I]2122-i had better hold the pony and remain on horseback ; but [I]2122-i dissented , [I]2122-i would n't risk losing sight of the charge committed to [me]2122-i a minute ; so [we]4473-we climbed [the slope of heath]4477-the slope of heath , together . [Master Heathcliff]43-heathcliff received [us]4473-we with greater animation on this occasion ; not the animation of high spirits though , nor yet of joy ; it looked more like fear . "[2122-i] It is late ! " [he]43-heathcliff said , speaking short , and with difficulty . "[2122-i] Is not [[your]2129-your father]2760-your father very ill ? [I]0-i thought [you]2129-your would n't come . " "[2129-your] Why wo n't [you]0-i be candid ? " cried [Catherine]56-catherine , swallowing [her]56-catherine greeting . "[0-i] Why can not [you]0-i say at once , [you]0-i do n't want [me]0-i ? It is strange [Linton]81-edgar , that for the second time , [you]0-i have brought [me]0-i [here]2574-here on purpose , apparently , to distress [us]2132-us both , and for no reason besides ! " [Linton]81-edgar shivered , and glanced at [her]56-catherine , half supplicating , half ashamed , but [[his]81-edgar cousin]4033-his cousin 's patience was not sufficient to endure this enigmatical behaviour . "[0-i] [[My]0-i father]338-my father is very ill , " [she]56-catherine said , "[0-i] and why am [I]0-i called from [his]338-my father bedside — why did n't [you]0-i send to absolve [me]0-i from [my]0-i promise , when [you]0-i wished [I]0-i would n't keep it ? Come ! [I]0-i desire an explanation — playing and trifling are completely banished out of [my]0-i mind : and [I]0-i ca n't dance attendance on [your]0-i affectations now ! ' " [My]0-i affectations ! "[0-i] [he]0-i murmured , " what are they ? For Heaven 's sake [Catherine]56-catherine , do n't look so angry ! Despise [me]0-i as much as [you]56-catherine please ; [I]0-i am [a worthless , cowardly wretch]4479-a worthless , cowardly wretch — [I]0-i ca n't be scorned enough ! but [I]0-i 'm too mean for [your]56-catherine anger — hate [[my]0-i father]338-my father , and spare [me]0-i , for contempt ! "[0-i] " Nonsense ! "[56-catherine] cried [Catherine]56-catherine in a passion . " [Foolish , silly boy]4481-foolish , silly boy ! And there ! [he]338-my father trembles , as if [I]56-catherine were really going to touch [him]338-my father ! [You]0-i need n't bespeak contempt , [Linton]56-catherine ; [anybody]329-anybody will have it spontaneously , at [your]56-catherine service . Get off ! [I]56-catherine shall return [home]239-home — it is folly dragging [you]0-i from the hearth - stone , and pretending — what do [we]4484-we pretend ? Let go [my]56-catherine frock — if [I]56-catherine pitied [you]0-i for crying , and looking so very frightened , [you]0-i should spurn such pity . [Ellen]80-ellen , tell [him]338-my father how disgraceful this conduct is . Rise , and do n't degrade [yourself]0-i into [an abject reptile]4485-an abject reptile — don't . "[56-catherine] With streaming face and an expression of agony , [Linton]56-catherine had thrown [his]2134-i nerveless frame along the ground ; [he]2134-i seemed convulsed with exquisite terror . " Oh ! "[2134-i] [he]2134-i sobbed , " [I]2134-i can not bear it ! [Catherine]56-catherine , [Catherine]56-catherine , [I]2134-i 'm [a traitor]4486-a traitor too , and [I]2134-i dare not tell [you]56-catherine ! But leave [me]2134-i and [I]2134-i shall be killed ! [Dear Catherine]56-catherine , [my]2134-i life is in [your]56-catherine hands ; and [you]56-catherine have said [you]56-catherine loved [me]2134-i — and if [you]56-catherine did , it would n't harm [you]56-catherine . [You]56-catherine 'll not go , then ? kind , sweet , good [Catherine]56-catherine ! And perhaps [you]56-catherine will consent — and [he]2136-he 'll let [me]2134-i die with [you]56-catherine ! "[2134-i] [[My]0-i young lady]3319-my young lady , on witnessing [his]2136-he intense anguish , stooped to raise [him]2136-he . The old feeling of indulgent tenderness overcame [her]3319-my young lady vexation , and [she]3319-my young lady grew thoroughly moved and alarmed . " Consent to what ? "[3319-my young lady] [she]3319-my young lady asked . " To stay ? Tell [me]3319-my young lady the meaning of this strange talk , and [I]3319-my young lady will . [You]56-catherine contradict [your]56-catherine own words , and distract [me]3319-my young lady ! Be calm and frank , and confess at once , all that weighs on [your]56-catherine heart . [You]56-catherine would n't injure [me]3319-my young lady , [Linton]56-catherine , would [you]56-catherine ? [You]56-catherine would n't let [any enemy]4487-any enemy hurt [me]3319-my young lady , if [you]56-catherine could prevent it ? [I]3319-my young lady 'll believe [you]56-catherine are [a coward]4488-a coward , for [yourself]56-catherine , but not [a cowardly betrayer of [[your]56-catherine best friend]4490-your best friend]4489-a cowardly betrayer of your best friend . [I]2803-the boy dare not tell ! "[2803-the boy] " Oh well ! "[56-catherine] said [Catherine]56-catherine , with scornful compassion , " keep [your]2803-the boy secret , [I]56-catherine 'm [no coward]4492-no coward — save [yourself]2803-the boy , [I]56-catherine 'm not afraid ! "[56-catherine] [Her]56-catherine magnanimity provoked [his]2803-the boy tears ; [he]2803-the boy wept wildly , kissing [her]56-catherine supporting hands , and yet could not summon courage to speak out . [I]0-i was cogitating what the mystery might be , and determined [Catherine]56-catherine should never suffer to benefit [him]2803-the boy or [any one else]3374-any one else , by [my]0-i good will . When hearing a rustle among the ling , [I]0-i looked up , and saw [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff almost close upon [us]2139-us , descending [the Heights]11-wuthering heights . [He]43-heathcliff did n't cast a glance towards [[my]0-i companions]2140-my companions , though [they]2140-my companions were sufficiently near for [Linton]56-catherine 's sobs to be audible ; but hailing [me]0-i in the almost hearty tone [he]43-heathcliff assumed to none besides , and the sincerity of which , [I]0-i could n't avoid doubting , [he]43-heathcliff said . " It is something to see [you]0-i so near to [[my]43-heathcliff house]1773-my house , [Nelly]80-ellen ! How are [you]0-i at [the Grange]2656-the grange ? Let [us]2139-us hear ! The rumour goes , "[43-heathcliff] [he]43-heathcliff added in a lower tone , " that [Edgar Linton]81-edgar is on [his]81-edgar death - bed — perhaps [they]2140-my companions exaggerate [his]81-edgar illness ? What was filling [him]43-heathcliff with dread , [we]2149-we had no means of discerning , but there [he]43-heathcliff was , powerless under its gripe , and [any addition]2150-any addition seemed capable of shocking [him]43-heathcliff into idiocy . [We]2149-we reached the threshold ; [Catherine]56-catherine walked in ; and [I]0-i stood waiting till [she]56-catherine had conducted [the invalid]3469-the invalid to a chair , expecting [her]56-catherine out , immediately ; when [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff pushing [me]0-i forward , exclaimed — " [[My]43-heathcliff house]1773-my house is not stricken with the plague , [Nelly]80-ellen ; and [I]43-heathcliff have a mind to be hospitable today ; sit down , and allow [me]43-heathcliff to shut the door . "[43-heathcliff] [He]43-heathcliff shut and locked it also , [I]0-i started . " [You]80-ellen shall have tea , before [you]80-ellen go [home]239-home , "[43-heathcliff] [he]43-heathcliff added . " [I]43-heathcliff am by [myself]43-heathcliff . [Hareton]47-hareton is gone with some cattle to [the Lees]157-the lees — and [Zillah]49-zillah and [Joseph]45-joseph are off on a journey of pleasure . And , though [I]43-heathcliff 'm used to being alone , [I]43-heathcliff 'd rather have some interesting company , if [I]43-heathcliff can get it . [I]43-heathcliff give [you]56-catherine what [I]43-heathcliff have ; the present is hardly worth accepting ; but , [I]43-heathcliff have nothing else to offer . It is [Linton]56-catherine , [I]43-heathcliff mean . How [she]56-catherine does stare ! It 's odd what a savage feeling [I]43-heathcliff have to anything that seems afraid of [me]43-heathcliff ! Had [I]43-heathcliff been born where laws are less strict , and tastes less dainty , [I]43-heathcliff should treat [myself]43-heathcliff to a slow vivifisection of those two , as an evening 's amusement . "[2152-his] " [I]56-catherine 'm not afraid of [you]43-heathcliff ! "[56-catherine] exclaimed [Catherine]56-catherine , who could not hear the latter part of [his]2152-his speech . [She]56-catherine stepped close up ; [her]56-catherine black eyes flashing with passion and resolution . " Give [me]56-catherine that key — [I]56-catherine will have it ! "[56-catherine] [she]56-catherine said " [I]56-catherine would'nt eat or drink here , if [I]56-catherine were starving . "[56-catherine] [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff had the key in [his]43-heathcliff hand that remained on the table . [He]43-heathcliff looked up , seized with a sort of surprise at [her]56-catherine boldness , or , possibly , reminded by [her]56-catherine voice and glance , of [the person from whom [she]56-catherine inherited it]2153-the person from whom she inherited it . [She]56-catherine snatched at the instrument , and half succeeded in getting it out of [his]43-heathcliff loosened lingers ; but [her]56-catherine action recalled [him]43-heathcliff to the present ; [he]43-heathcliff recovered it speedily . " Now , [Catherine Linton]56-catherine , "[43-heathcliff] [he]43-heathcliff said , " stand off , or [I]43-heathcliff shall knock [you]56-catherine down ; and that will make [Mrs. Dean]71-mrs. dean mad . "[43-heathcliff] Regardless of this warning , [she]56-catherine captured [his]43-heathcliff closed hand , and its contents again . " [We]4516-we will go ! "[56-catherine] [she]56-catherine repeated , exerting [her]56-catherine utmost efforts to cause the iron muscles to relax ; and finding that [her]56-catherine nails made no impression , [she]56-catherine applied [her]56-catherine teeth pretty sharply . [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff glanced at [me]0-i a glance that kept [me]0-i from interfering a moment . [Catherine]56-catherine was too intent on [his]43-heathcliff fingers to notice [his]43-heathcliff face . [He]43-heathcliff opened them , suddenly , and resigned the object of dispute ; but , ere [she]56-catherine had well secured it , [he]43-heathcliff seized [her]56-catherine with the liberated hand , and , pulling [her]56-catherine on [his]43-heathcliff knee , administered , with the other , a shower of terrific slaps on both sides of the head , each sufficient to have fulfilled [his]43-heathcliff threat , had [she]56-catherine been able to fall . At this diabolical violence , [I]0-i rushed on [him]43-heathcliff furiously . " [[You]43-heathcliff villain]4517-you villain ! "[0-i] [I]0-i began to cry , " [[you]43-heathcliff villain]4517-you villain ! "[0-i] A touch on the chest silenced [me]0-i ; [I]0-i am stout , and soon put out of breath ; and , what with that and the rage , [I]0-i staggered dizzily back , and felt ready to suffocate , or to burst a blood - vessel . The scene was over in two minutes ; [Catherine]56-catherine , released , put [her]56-catherine two hands to [her]56-catherine temples , and looked just as if [she]56-catherine were not sure whether [her]56-catherine ears were off or on . [She]56-catherine trembled like a reed , poor thing , and leant against the table perfectly bewildered . " [I]3327-the scoundrel know how to chastise [children]704-children , [you]0-i see , "[3327-the scoundrel] said [the scoundrel]3327-the scoundrel , grimly , as [he]3327-the scoundrel stooped to repossess [himself]3327-the scoundrel of the key , which had dropped to the floor . [You]2158-he want whipping for bringing [us]2161-us in [here]2574-here at all , with [your]2158-he dastardly , puling tricks ; and — don't look so silly now ! "[2163-me] " [I]56-catherine must obey [my]56-catherine own , "[56-catherine] [she]56-catherine replied , " and relieve [him]338-my father from this cruel suspense . The whole night ! "[56-catherine] The mortal terror [he]2164-his felt of [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff 's anger , restored to [the boy]2803-the boy [his]2164-his coward 's eloquence . [Catherine]56-catherine was near distraught — still , [she]56-catherine persisted that [she]56-catherine must go [home]239-home , and tried entreaty , in [her]56-catherine turn , persuading [him]2164-his to subdue [his]2164-his selfish agony . " [Your]56-catherine beasts have trotted off ; "[2169-our jailer] [he]2169-our jailer said , " and — Now , [Linton]56-catherine ! snivelling again ? [I]2170-i 'll look to the rest , "[2170-i] [He]2170-i spoke these words , holding the door open for [[his]2170-i son]475-his son to pass ; and [the latter]2991-the latter achieved [his]2991-the latter exit exactly as a spaniel might which suspected [the person who attended on it of designing a spiteful squeeze]2173-the person who attended on it of designing a spiteful squeeze . The lock was re - secured . [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff approached the fire , where [[my]0-i mistress]493-my mistress and [I]0-i stood silent . [Catherine]56-catherine looked up , and instinctively raised [her]56-catherine hand to [her]56-catherine cheek — [his]43-heathcliff neighbourhood revived a painful sensation . [Anybody else]2175-anybody else would have been incapable of regarding the childish act with sternness , but [he]43-heathcliff scowled on [her]56-catherine , and muttered — " Oh , [you]56-catherine are not afraid of [me]43-heathcliff ? [Your]56-catherine courage is well disguised — [you]56-catherine seem damnably afraid ! "[43-heathcliff] " [I]56-catherine am afraid now , "[56-catherine] [she]56-catherine replied ; " because if [I]56-catherine stay , [papa]2871-papa will be miserable ; and how can [I]56-catherine endure making [him]2871-papa miserable — when [he]2871-papa — when [he]2871-papa — [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff , let [me]56-catherine go [home]239-home ! "[56-catherine] " Let [him]2871-papa dare to force [you]43-heathcliff ! "[0-i] [I]0-i cried . " There 's law in [the land]4547-the land , thank [God]66-god , there is ! though [we]4548-we be in [an out - of - the - way place]4549-an out - of - the - way place . [I]0-i 'd inform , if [he]2871-papa were [[my]0-i own son]4550-my own son , and it 's felony without benefit of [clergy]4551-clergy ! "[0-i] " Silence ! "[3793-the ruffian] said [the ruffian]3793-the ruffian . " To the devil with [your]0-i clamour ! [I]3793-the ruffian do n't want [you]0-i to speak . [Miss Linton]56-catherine , [I]3793-the ruffian shall enjoy [myself]3793-the ruffian remarkably in thinking [[your]0-i father]2760-your father will be miserable ; [I]3793-the ruffian shall not sleep for satisfaction . [You]0-i could have hit on no surer way of fixing [[your]0-i residence under [my]3793-the ruffian roof]4553-your residence under my roof , for the next twenty - four hours , than informing [me]3793-the ruffian that such an event would follow . As to [your]0-i promise to marry [Linton]56-catherine ; [I]3793-the ruffian 'll take care [you]0-i shall keep it , for [you]0-i shall not quit [the place]188-the place till it is fulfilled . "[3793-the ruffian] " Send [Ellen]80-ellen then , to let [papa]2871-papa know [I]56-catherine 'm safe ! "[56-catherine] exclaimed [Catherine]56-catherine , weeping bitterly . " Or marry [me]56-catherine now . [Poor papa]4556-poor papa ! [Ellen]80-ellen , [he]2871-papa 'll think [we]4557-we 're lost . What shall [we]4557-we do ? "[56-catherine] " Not [he]2871-papa ! [He]2871-papa 'll think [you]0-i are tired of waiting on [him]2871-papa , and run off , for a little amusement , "[43-heathcliff] answered [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff . " [You]0-i can not deny that [you]0-i entered [[my]43-heathcliff house]1773-my house of [your]0-i own accord , in contempt of [his]2871-papa injunctions to the contrary . And it is quite natural that [you]0-i should desire amusement at [your]0-i age ; and that [you]0-i should weary of nursing [a sick man]4559-a sick man , and [that man]3334-that man , only [[your]0-i father]2760-your father . [Catherine]56-catherine , [his]2871-papa happiest days were over when [your]0-i days began . [He]2871-papa cursed [you]0-i , [I]43-heathcliff dare say , for coming into [the world]267-the world , ( [I]43-heathcliff did , at least ) . And it would just do if [he]2871-papa cursed [you]0-i as [he]2871-papa went out of it . [I]43-heathcliff 'd join [him]2871-papa . [I]43-heathcliff do n't love [you]0-i ! How should [I]43-heathcliff ? Weep away . As far as [I]43-heathcliff can see , it will be [your]0-i chief diversion hereafter : unless [Linton]56-catherine make amends for other losses ; and [[your]0-i provident parent]4563-your provident parent appears to fancy [he]2871-papa may . [His]2871-papa letters of advice and consolation entertained [me]43-heathcliff vastly . In [his]2871-papa last , [he]2871-papa recommended [[my]43-heathcliff jewel]4564-my jewel to be careful of [his]2871-papa ; and kind to [her]4564-my jewel when [he]2871-papa got [her]4564-my jewel . Careful and kind — that 's paternal ! But [Linton]56-catherine requires [his]2871-papa whole stock of care and kindness for [himself]2871-papa [Linton]56-catherine can play [the little tyrant]4565-the little tyrant well . [He]2871-papa 'll undertake to torture any number of cats if [their]4566-their teeth be drawn , and their claws pared . [You]43-heathcliff 'll be able to tell [[his]2871-papa uncle]4030-his uncle fine tales of [his]2871-papa kindness , when [you]43-heathcliff get [home]239-home again , [I]43-heathcliff assure [you]43-heathcliff . "[43-heathcliff] " [You]43-heathcliff 're right there ! "[0-i] [I]0-i said , " explain [[your]43-heathcliff son]1767-your son 's character . Show [his]2871-papa resemblance to [yourself]43-heathcliff ; and then , [I]0-i hope , [Miss Cathy]56-catherine will think twice , before [she]56-catherine takes the cockatrice ! "[0-i] " [I]0-i do n't much mind speaking of [his]2871-papa amiable qualities now , "[0-i] [he]0-i answered , " because [she]56-catherine must either accept [him]2871-papa , or remain [a prisoner]4570-a prisoner , and [you]43-heathcliff along with [her]56-catherine , till [[your]43-heathcliff master]3179-your master dies . "[0-i] " [I]56-catherine 'll not retract [my]56-catherine word , "[56-catherine] said [Catherine]56-catherine . " [I]56-catherine 'll marry [him]2871-papa , within this hour , if [I]56-catherine may go to [Thrushcross Grange]73-mr. linton afterwards . [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff , [you]43-heathcliff 're [a cruel man]4572-a cruel man , but [you]43-heathcliff 're not [a fiend]2992-a fiend ; and [you]43-heathcliff wo nt , from mere malice , destroy , irrevocably , all [my]56-catherine happiness . If [papa]4574-papa thought [I]56-catherine had left [him]2871-papa , on purpose ; and if [he]2871-papa died before [I]56-catherine returned , could [I]56-catherine bear to live ? [I]56-catherine 've given over crying ; but [I]56-catherine 'm going to kneel here , at [your]43-heathcliff knee ; and [I]56-catherine 'll not get up , and [I]56-catherine 'll not take [my]56-catherine eyes from [your]43-heathcliff face , till [you]43-heathcliff look back at [me]56-catherine ! No , do n't turn away ! do look ! [You]43-heathcliff 'll see nothing to provoke [you]43-heathcliff . [I]56-catherine do n't hate [you]43-heathcliff . [I]56-catherine 'm not angry that [you]43-heathcliff struck [me]56-catherine . Have [you]43-heathcliff never loved [anybody]329-anybody , in all [your]43-heathcliff life , [uncle]1673-uncle ? never ? Ah ! [you]43-heathcliff must look once — [I'm]56-catherine so wretched — [you]43-heathcliff ca n't help being sorry and pitying [me]56-catherine . "[56-catherine] " Keep [your]43-heathcliff eft 's fingers off ; and move , or [I]43-heathcliff 'll kick [you]43-heathcliff ! "[43-heathcliff] cried [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff , brutally repulsing [her]2177-her . " [I]43-heathcliff 'd rather be hugged by a snake . How the devil can [you]43-heathcliff dream of fawning on [me]43-heathcliff ? [I]43-heathcliff detest [you]43-heathcliff ! "[43-heathcliff] [He]43-heathcliff shrugged [his]43-heathcliff shoulders — shook [himself]43-heathcliff , indeed , as if [his]43-heathcliff flesh crept with aversion ; and thrust back [his]43-heathcliff chair : while [I]0-i got up , and opened [my]0-i mouth , to commence a downright torrent of abuse ; but [I]0-i was rendered dumb in the middle of the first sentence , by a threat that [I]0-i should be shown into [a room]2178-a room by [myself]0-i , the very next syllable [I]0-i uttered . It was growing dark — [we]2179-we heard a sound of voices at the garden gate . [[Our]2179-we host]2180-our host hurried out , instantly ; [he]2180-our host had [his]2180-our host wits about [him]2180-our host ; [we]2179-we had not . There was a talk of two or three minutes , and [he]2180-our host returned alone . " [I]0-i thought it had been [[your]56-catherine cousin]3950-your cousin [Hareton]47-hareton , "[0-i] [I]0-i observed to [Catherine]56-catherine . " [I]0-i wish [he]3950-your cousin would arrive ! Who knows but [he]3950-your cousin might take [our]2179-we part ? "[0-i] " It was [three servants]4578-three servants sent to seek [you]0-i from [the Grange]2656-the grange , "[43-heathcliff] said [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff , overhearing [me]0-i . " [You]0-i should have opened a lattice , and called out ; but [I]43-heathcliff could swear that chit is glad [you]0-i did n't . [She]49-zillah 's glad to be obliged to stay , [I]43-heathcliff 'm certain . "[43-heathcliff] At learning the chance [we]2181-we had missed , [we]2181-we both gave vent to [our]2181-we grief without control ; and [he]43-heathcliff allowed [us]2181-we to wail on till nine o'clock ; then [he]43-heathcliff bid [us]2181-we go up stairs , through [the kitchen]194-the kitchen , to [[Zillah]49-zillah 's chamber]2183-zillah 's chamber ; and [I]0-i whispered [[my]0-i companion]350-my companion to obey ; perhaps , [we]2181-we might contrive to get through the window there , or into [a garret]2185-a garret , and out by its skylight . The window , however , was narrow like those below , and the garret trap was safe from [our]2181-we attempts ; for [we]2181-we were fastened in as before . [We]2181-we neither of [us]2181-we lay down : [Catherine]56-catherine took [her]56-catherine station by the lattice , and watched anxiously for morning — a deep sigh being the only answer [I]0-i could obtain to [my]0-i frequent entreaties that [she]56-catherine would try to rest . [I]0-i seated [myself]0-i in a chair , and rocked , to and fro , passing harsh judgment on [my]0-i many derelictions of duty ; from which , it struck [me]0-i then , all the misfortunes of all [[my]0-i employers]2186-my employers sprang . It was not the case , in reality , [I]0-i am aware ; but it was , in [my]0-i imagination , that dismal night , and [I]0-i thought [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff [himself]43-heathcliff less guilty than [I.]0-i At seven o'clock [he]43-heathcliff came , and inquired if [Miss Linton]56-catherine had risen . [She]56-catherine ran to the door immediately , and answered — " Yes . "[56-catherine] " Here then , "[43-heathcliff] [he]43-heathcliff said , opening it , and pulling [her]56-catherine out . [I]0-i rose to follow , but [he]43-heathcliff turned the lock again . [I]0-i demanded [my]0-i release . " Be patient , "[43-heathcliff] [he]43-heathcliff replied ; " [I]43-heathcliff 'll send up [your]0-i breakfast in a while . "[43-heathcliff] [I]0-i thumped on the panels , and rattled the latch angrily ; and [Catherine]56-catherine asked why [I]0-i was still shut up ? [He]43-heathcliff answered , [I]0-i must try to endure it another hour , and [they]2187-they went away . [I]0-i endured it two or three hours ; at length , [I]0-i heard a footstep , not [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff 's . " [I]43-heathcliff 've brought [you]0-i something to eat , "[43-heathcliff] said a voice ; " oppen t ' door ! "[43-heathcliff] Complying eagerly , [I]0-i beheld [Hareton]47-hareton , laden with food enough to last [me]0-i all day . " Tak it ! "[43-heathcliff] [he]43-heathcliff added , thrusting the tray into [my]0-i hand . " Stay one minute , "[0-i] [I]0-i began . " Nay ! "[43-heathcliff] cried [he]43-heathcliff , and retired , regardless of any prayers [I]0-i could pour forth to detain [him]43-heathcliff . " And there [I]0-i remained enclosed , the whole day , and the whole of the next night ; and another , and another . Five nights and four days [I]0-i remained , altogether , seeing [nobody]442-nobody but [Hareton]47-hareton , once every morning , and [he]47-hareton was [a model of [a jailer]4582-a jailer]4581-a model of a jailer — surly , and dumb , and deaf to every attempt at moving [his]47-hareton sense of justice or compassion . On the fifth morning , or rather afternoon , a different step approached — lighter and shorter — and , this time , [the person]3173-the person entered [the room]243-the room . It was [Zillah]49-zillah ; donned in [her]49-zillah scarlet shawl , with a black silk bonnet on [her]49-zillah head , and a willow basket swung to [her]49-zillah arm . "[0-i] Eh , [dear]634-dear ! [Mrs. Dean]71-mrs. dean , " [she]49-zillah exclaimed . "[71-mrs. dean] Well ! there is a talk about [you]634-dear at [Gimmerton]14-gimmerton . [I]0-i never thought , but [you]634-dear were sunk in [the Blackhorse marsh]779-the blackhorse marsh , and [Missy]90-missy with [you]634-dear , till [master]2968-master told [me]0-i [you]634-dear 'd been found , and [he]2968-master 'd lodged [you]634-dear here ! " "[634-dear] [[Your]634-dear master]3179-your master is [a true scoundrel]2195-a true scoundrel ! " [I]2195-a true scoundrel replied . " "[3179-your master] What do [you]3179-your master mean ? " asked [Zillah]49-zillah . "[3179-your master] It 's not [his]3179-your master tale — [they]2196-they tell that in [the village]1197-the village — about [your]634-dear being lost in [the marsh]3941-the marsh ; and [I]0-i calls to [Earnshaw]47-hareton , when [I]0-i come in — " "[0-i] Eh , [they]2199-they 's queer things , [Mr. Hareton]47-hareton , happened since [I]0-i went off . [Nelly Dean]71-mrs. dean is lodged , at this minute , in [[your]49-zillah room]4350-your room . [You]49-zillah can tell [her]71-mrs. dean to flit , when [you]49-zillah go up ; here is the key . The bog - water got into [her]71-mrs. dean head , and [she]71-mrs. dean would have run [home]239-home , quite flighty , but [I]0-i fixed [her]71-mrs. dean , till [she]71-mrs. dean came round to [her]71-mrs. dean senses . ' " "[91-edgar] [Mr. Edgar]91-edgar is not dead ? " [I]91-edgar gasped . "[91-edgar] Oh ! [Zillah]49-zillah , [Zillah]49-zillah ! " "[49-zillah] No , no — sit [you]49-zillah down , [[my]0-i good mistress]2207-my good mistress , " [she]2207-my good mistress replied , "[49-zillah] [you]49-zillah 're right sickly yet . [He]91-edgar 's not dead : [Doctor Kenneth]158-doctor kenneth thinks [he]91-edgar may last another day — [I]0-i met [him]91-edgar on [the road]2638-the road and asked . " Instead of sitting down , [I]0-i snatched [my]0-i outdoor things , and hastened below , for the way was free . On entering [the house]185-the house , [I]0-i looked about for [some one]4587-some one to give information of [Catherine]56-catherine . [The place]188-the place was filled with sunshine , and the door stood wide open , but [nobody]442-nobody seemed at hand . As [I]0-i hesitated whether to go off at once , or return and seek [[my]0-i mistress]493-my mistress , a slight cough drew [my]0-i attention to the hearth . [Linton]56-catherine lay on the settle , [sole tenant]4591-sole tenant , sucking a stick of sugar - candy , and pursuing [my]0-i movements with apathetic eyes . "[0-i] Where is [Miss Catherine]56-catherine ? " [I]56-catherine demanded , sternly , supposing [I]56-catherine could frighten [him]4591-sole tenant into giving intelligence , by catching [him]4591-sole tenant thus , alone . [He]4591-sole tenant sucked on like [an innocent]4592-an innocent . "[56-catherine] Is [she]56-catherine gone ? " [I]56-catherine said . "[56-catherine] No , " [he]4591-sole tenant replied ; "[56-catherine] [she]56-catherine 's up [stairs]416-stairs — [she]56-catherine 's not to go ; [we]2210-we wo nt let [her]56-catherine . " "[2211-you] [You]2211-you wo nt let [her]56-catherine , [little idiot]2212-little idiot ! " [I]56-catherine exclaimed . "[56-catherine] Direct [me]0-i to [[her]56-catherine room]800-her room immediately , or [I]0-i 'll make [you]2212-little idiot sing out sharply . " "[0-i] [Papa]133-papa would make [you]0-i sing out , if [you]0-i attempted to get [there]2637-there , " [he]133-papa answered . "[133-papa] [He]133-papa says [I]0-i 'm not to be soft with [Catherine]56-catherine — [she]56-catherine 's [[my]0-i wife]1941-my wife , and it 's shameful that [she]56-catherine should wish to leave [me]0-i ! [He]133-papa says , [she]56-catherine hates [me]0-i , and wants [me]0-i to die , that [she]56-catherine may have [my]0-i money , but [she]56-catherine sha n't have it ; and [she]56-catherine sha n't go [home]239-home ! [she]56-catherine never shall ! [she]56-catherine may cry , and be sick as much as [she]56-catherine pleases ! " [He]43-heathcliff resumed [his]43-heathcliff former occupation , closing [his]43-heathcliff lids , as if [he]43-heathcliff meant to drop asleep . "[43-heathcliff] [Master Heathcliff]43-heathcliff , " [I]43-heathcliff resumed , "[43-heathcliff] have [you]43-heathcliff forgotten all [Catherine]56-catherine 's kindness to [you]43-heathcliff , last winter , when [you]43-heathcliff affirmed [you]43-heathcliff loved [her]56-catherine , and when [she]56-catherine brought [you]43-heathcliff books , and sung [you]43-heathcliff songs , and came many a time through wind and snow to see [you]43-heathcliff ? [She]56-catherine wept to miss one evening , because [you]43-heathcliff would be disappointed ; and [you]43-heathcliff felt then , that [she]56-catherine was a hundred times too good to [you]43-heathcliff ; and now [you]43-heathcliff believe the lies [[your]43-heathcliff father]2760-your father tells , though [you]43-heathcliff know [he]2760-your father detests [you]43-heathcliff both ! And [you]43-heathcliff join [him]2760-your father against [her]56-catherine . That 's fine gratitude , is it not ? " The corner , of [Linton]56-catherine 's mouth fell , and [he]43-heathcliff took the sugar - candy from [his]43-heathcliff [his]43-heathcliff lips . "[56-catherine] Did [she]56-catherine come to [Wuthering Heights]11-wuthering heights , because [she]56-catherine hated [you]43-heathcliff ? " [I]56-catherine continued . "[56-catherine] Think for [yourself]43-heathcliff ! As to [your]43-heathcliff money , [she]56-catherine does not even know that [you]43-heathcliff will have any . And [you]43-heathcliff say [she]56-catherine 's sick ; and yet , [you]43-heathcliff leave [her]56-catherine alone , up there in [a strange house]2218-a strange house ! [You]43-heathcliff , who have felt what it is to be so neglected ! [You]43-heathcliff could pity [your]43-heathcliff own sufferings , and [she]56-catherine pitied them , too , but [you]43-heathcliff wo n't pity [hers]56-catherine ! [I]0-i shed tears [Master Heathcliff]43-heathcliff , [you]43-heathcliff see — [an elderly woman]2219-an elderly woman , and [a servant]269-a servant merely — and [you]43-heathcliff , after pretending such affection , and having reason to worship [her]56-catherine , almost , store every tear [you]43-heathcliff have for [yourself]43-heathcliff , and lie there quite at ease . Ah ! [you]43-heathcliff 're [a heartless , selfish boy]2221-a heartless , selfish boy ! " "[0-i] [I]0-i ca n't stay with [her]56-catherine , " [he]0-i answered crossly . "[0-i] [I]0-i 'll not stay , by [myself]0-i . [She]56-catherine cries so [I]0-i ca n't bear it . And [she]56-catherine wo nt give over , though [I]0-i say [I]0-i 'll call [[my]0-i father]338-my father — [I]0-i did call [him]338-my father once ; and [he]338-my father threatened to strangle [her]56-catherine , if [she]56-catherine was not quiet , but [she]56-catherine began again , the instant [he]338-my father left [the room]243-the room ; moaning and grieving , all night long , though [I]0-i screamed for vexation that [I]0-i could n't sleep . " "[56-catherine] Is [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff out , " [I]43-heathcliff inquired , perceiving that [the wretched creature]4593-the wretched creature had no power to sympathise with [[his]0-i cousin]4033-his cousin 's mental tortures . "[43-heathcliff] [He]43-heathcliff 's in [the court]180-the court , " [he]43-heathcliff replied , "[43-heathcliff] talking to Doctor Kenneth who says [uncle]1673-uncle is dying , truly , at last — [I'm]2226-i'm glad for [I]0-i shall be [master of the Grange after [him]43-heathcliff]2227-master of the grange after him — and [Catherine]56-catherine always spoke of [it]2228-it , as [[her]56-catherine house]2229-her house . [It]2228-it is n't [hers]56-catherine ! [It]2228-it 's [mine]2230-mine — [papa]2871-papa says everything [she]56-catherine has is [mine]2230-mine . All [her]56-catherine nice books are [mine]2230-mine — [she]56-catherine offered to give [me]0-i them , and [her]56-catherine pretty birds , and [her]56-catherine pony [Minny]134-minny , if [I]0-i would get the key of [[our]2232-our room]1335-our room , and let [her]56-catherine out : but [I]0-i told [her]56-catherine [she]56-catherine had nothing to give , they were all , all mine . And then [she]56-catherine cried , and took a little picture from [her]56-catherine neck , and said [I]0-i should have that — two pictures in a gold case — on one side [[her]56-catherine mother]1556-her mother , and on the other , [uncle]1673-uncle , when [they]2236-they were young . That was yesterday — [I]0-i said they were [mine]0-i , too ; and tried to get them from [her]56-catherine . The spiteful thing would n't let [me]0-i ; [she]56-catherine pushed [me]0-i off , and hurt [me]0-i . [I]0-i shrieked out — that frightens [her]56-catherine — [she]56-catherine heard [papa]2871-papa coming , and [she]56-catherine broke the hinges , and divided the case and gave [me]0-i [[her]56-catherine mother]1556-her mother 's portrait ; the other [she]56-catherine attempted to hide ; but [papa]2871-papa asked what was the matter and [I]0-i explained it . [He]2871-papa took the one [I]0-i had away ; and ordered [her]56-catherine to resign [hers]56-catherine to [me]0-i ; [she]56-catherine refused , and [he]2871-papa — [he]2871-papa struck [her]56-catherine down , and wrenched it off the chain , and crushed it with [his]2871-papa foot . " "[2871-papa] And were [you]2871-papa pleased to see [her]56-catherine struck ? " [I]0-i asked : having [my]0-i designs in encouraging [his]2871-papa talk . "[0-i] [I]0-i winked , " [he]2871-papa answered . "[0-i] [I]0-i wink to see [[my]0-i father]338-my father strike a dog , or a horse , [he]338-my father does it so hard — yet [I]0-i was glad at first — [she]56-catherine deserved punishing for pushing [me]0-i : but when [papa]2871-papa was gone , [she]56-catherine made [me]0-i come to the window and showed [me]0-i [her]56-catherine cheek cut on the inside , against [her]56-catherine teeth , and [her]56-catherine mouth filling with blood : and then [she]56-catherine gathered up the bits of the picture , and went and sat down with [her]56-catherine face to the wall , and [she]56-catherine has never spoken to [me]0-i since ; and [I]0-i sometimes think [she]56-catherine ca n't speak for pain . [I]0-i do n't like to think so ! but [she]56-catherine 's a naughty thing for crying continually ; and [she]56-catherine looks so pale and wild , [I]0-i 'm afraid of [her]56-catherine ! " "[56-catherine] And [you]0-i can get the key if [you]0-i choose ? " [I]56-catherine said . "[56-catherine] Yes , when [I]0-i am up - stairs , " [he]0-i answered "[56-catherine] but [I]0-i ca n't walk up - stairs now . " "[0-i] In [what apartment]2242-what apartment is [it]2243-it ? " [I]0-i asked . "[0-i] Oh , [he]0-i cried , [I]0-i sha nt tell [you]2244-you where it is ! It is [[our]2245-our secret]2246-our secret . [Nobody]442-nobody , neither [Hareton]47-hareton , nor [Zillah]49-zillah are to know . There ! [you]2244-you 've tired [me]0-i — go away , go away ! " And [he]0-i turned [his]0-i face onto [his]0-i arm , and shut [his]0-i eyes , again . [I]56-catherine considered it best to depart without seeing [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff ; and bring a rescue for [[my]56-catherine young lady]3319-my young lady , from [the Grange]73-mr. linton . On reaching [it]73-mr. linton the astonishment of [[my]56-catherine fellow servants]1371-my fellow servants to see [me]56-catherine , and [their]1371-my fellow servants joy also , was intense ; and when [they]1371-my fellow servants heard that [[their]1371-my fellow servants little mistress]4597-their little mistress was safe , [two or three]4598-two or three were about to hurry up , and shout the news at [Mr. Edgar]91-edgar 's door : but [I]56-catherine bespoke the announcement of it , [myself]56-catherine . How changed [I]56-catherine found [him]0-i , even in those few days ! [He]0-i lay an image of sadness , and resignation , waiting [his]0-i death . Very young [he]0-i looked : though [his]0-i actual age was thirty - nine ; [one]285-one would have called [him]0-i ten years younger , at least . [He]0-i thought of [Catherine]56-catherine for [he]0-i murmured [her]56-catherine name . [I]56-catherine touched [his]0-i hand , and spoke . "[56-catherine] [Catherine]56-catherine is coming , [dear master]2248-dear master ! " [I]56-catherine whispered , "[56-catherine] [she]56-catherine is alive , and well ; and will be [here]2574-here [I]0-i hope to - night . " [I]56-catherine trembled at the first effects of this intelligence : [he]0-i half rose up , looked eagerly round [the apartment]195-the apartment , and then sunk back in a swoon . As soon as [he]0-i recovered , [I]56-catherine related [our]4601-our compulsory visit , and detention at [the Heights]568-the heights : [I]56-catherine said [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff forced [me]56-catherine to go in , which was not quite true ; [I]56-catherine uttered as little as possible against [Linton]56-catherine ; nor did [I]56-catherine describe all [[his]0-i father]518-his father 's brutal conduct — [my]56-catherine intentions being to add no bitterness , if [I]56-catherine could help it , to [his]0-i already overflowing cup . [He]0-i divined that one of [[his]0-i enemy]4604-his enemy 's purposes was to secure the personal property , as well as the estate to [[his]0-i son]475-his son , or rather [himself]0-i ; yet why [he]0-i did not wait till [his]0-i decease , was a puzzle to [[my]56-catherine master]530-my master ; because ignorant how nearly [he]0-i , and [[his]0-i nephew]2067-his nephew would quit [the world]267-the world together . However [he]0-i felt [his]0-i will had better be altered — instead of leaving [Catherine]56-catherine 's fortune at [her]56-catherine own disposal , [he]0-i determined to put it in the hands of [trustees]4609-trustees , for [her]56-catherine use during life ; and for [[her]56-catherine children]4610-her children , if [she]56-catherine had any , after [her]56-catherine . By that means , it could not fall to [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff should [Linton]56-catherine die . Having received [his]0-i orders , [I]56-catherine despatched [a man]2653-a man to fetch [the attorney]3890-the attorney , and [four more , provided with serviceable weapons]4613-four more , provided with serviceable weapons , to demand [[my]56-catherine young lady of [[her]56-catherine jailer]4615-her jailer]4614-my young lady of her jailer . [Both parties]4616-both parties were delayed very late . [The single servant]4617-the single servant returned first . [He]0-i said [Mr. Green]159-mr. green , [the lawyer]4618-the lawyer , was out when [he]0-i arrived at [[his]0-i house]3060-his house , and [he]0-i had to wait two hours for [his]0-i re - entrance : and then [Mr. Green]159-mr. green told [him]0-i [he]0-i had a little business in [the village]1197-the village , that must be done , but [he]0-i would be at [Thrushcross Grange]73-mr. linton before morning . [The four men]4621-the four men came back unaccompanied , also . [They]4621-the four men brought word that [Catherine]56-catherine was ill , too ill to quit [[her]56-catherine room]800-her room , and [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff would not suffer [them]4621-the four men to see [her]56-catherine . [I]56-catherine scolded [the stupid fellows]4623-the stupid fellows well , for listening to that tale , which [I]56-catherine would not carry to [[my]56-catherine master]530-my master ; resolving to take a whole bevy up to [the Heights]11-wuthering heights , at daylight , and storm it , literally , unless [the prisoner]729-the prisoner were quietly surrendered to [us]4626-us . [[Her]56-catherine father]502-her father shall see [her]56-catherine , [I]56-catherine vowed , and vowed again , if [that devil]1293-that devil be killed on [his]1293-that devil own doorstones , in trying to prevent it ! [Happily]160-happily , [I]56-catherine was spared the journey , and the trouble . [I]56-catherine had gone down [stairs]416-stairs at three o'clock to fetch a jug of water ; and was passing through [the hall]3354-the hall , with it in [my]56-catherine hand , when a sharp knock , at the front door , made [me]56-catherine jump . "[56-catherine] Oh ! it is [Green]159-mr. green — [I]0-i said recollecting [myself]0-i — only [Green]159-mr. green , " and [I]159-mr. green went on , intending to send [somebody else]4631-somebody else to open it ; but the knock was repeated , not loud , and still importunately . [I]159-mr. green put the jug on the bannister , and hastened to admit [him]159-mr. green , [myself]159-mr. green . The harvest moon shone clear outside . It was not [the attorney]3890-the attorney . [[My]159-mr. green own sweet little mistress]4633-my own sweet little mistress sprung on [my]159-mr. green neck sobbing , "[159-mr. green] [Ellen]80-ellen ! [Ellen]80-ellen ! Is [papa]133-papa alive ? " "[133-papa] Yes ! " [I]133-papa cried , "[133-papa] yes [[my]0-i angel]2250-my angel [he]133-papa is ! [God]66-god be thanked , [you]2251-you are safe with [us]2252-us again ! " [She]4633-my own sweet little mistress wanted to run , breathless as [she]4633-my own sweet little mistress was , up - stairs to [[Mr , Linton]73-mr. linton 's room]4634-mr , linton 's room ; but [I]0-i compelled [her]4633-my own sweet little mistress to sit down on a chair , and made [her]4633-my own sweet little mistress drink , and washed [her]4633-my own sweet little mistress pale face , chafing it into a faint colour with [my]0-i apron . Then [I]0-i said [I]0-i must go first , and tell of [her]4633-my own sweet little mistress arrival ; imploring [her]4633-my own sweet little mistress to say , [she]4633-my own sweet little mistress should be happy , with [young Heathcliff]43-heathcliff . [She]4633-my own sweet little mistress stared , but soon comprehending why [I]0-i counselled [her]4633-my own sweet little mistress to utter the falsehood , [she]4633-my own sweet little mistress assured [me]0-i [she]4633-my own sweet little mistress would not complain . [I]0-i could n't abide to be present at [their]4635-their meeting . [I]0-i stood outside [the chamber]2699-the chamber - door , a quarter of an hour , and hardly ventured near the bed , then . All was composed , however ; [Catherine]56-catherine 's despair was as silent as [[her]56-catherine father]502-her father 's joy . [She]56-catherine supported [him]502-her father calmly , in appearance ; and [he]502-her father fixed on [her]56-catherine features [his]502-her father raised eyes that seemed dilating with ecstasy . [He]502-her father died blissfully , [Mr. Lockwood]44-mr. lockwood ; [he]502-her father died so , kissing [her]56-catherine cheek , [he]502-her father murmured , "[0-i] [I]0-i am going to [her]2253-i , and [[you]2253-i darling child]2254-you darling child shall come to [us]2255-us ; " and never stirred or spoke again , but continued that rapt , radiant gaze , till [his]502-her father pulse imperceptibly stopped , and [his]502-her father soul departed . None could have noticed the exact minute of [his]502-her father death , it was so entirely without a struggle . Whether [Catherine]56-catherine had spent [her]56-catherine tears , or whether the grief were too weighty to let them flow , [she]56-catherine sat there dry - eyed till the sun rose — [she]56-catherine sat till noon , and would still have remained , brooding over that death - bed , but [I]2253-i insisted on [her]56-catherine coming away , and taking some repose . It was well [I]2253-i succeeded in removing [her]56-catherine , for at dinner - time appeared [the lawyer]4618-the lawyer , having called at [Wuthering Heights]11-wuthering heights to get [his]4618-the lawyer instructions how to behave . [He]4618-the lawyer had sold [himself]4618-the lawyer to [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff , and that was the cause of [his]4618-the lawyer delay in obeying [[my]2253-i master]530-my master 's summons . Fortunately , no thought of worldly affairs crossed [the latter]2991-the latter 's mind , to disturb [him]4618-the lawyer , after [[his]4618-the lawyer daughter]4009-his daughter 's arrival . [Mr. Green]159-mr. green took upon [himself]159-mr. green to order everything and everybody about [the place]188-the place . [He]159-mr. green gave [all the servants]4643-all the servants but [me]2253-i , notice to quit . [He]159-mr. green would have carried [his]159-mr. green delegated authority to the point of insisting that [Edgar Linton]81-edgar should not be buried beside [[his]159-mr. green wife]2670-his wife , but in [the chapel]366-the chapel , with [[his]159-mr. green family]2781-his family . There was the will however , to hinder that , and [my]2253-i loud protestations against any infringement of its directions . The funeral was hurried over ; [Catherine]56-catherine , [Mrs. Linton Heathcliff]48-mrs. linton now , was suffered to stay at [the Grange]2656-the grange , till [[her]56-catherine father]502-her father 's corpse had quitted it . [She]56-catherine told [me]2253-i that [her]56-catherine anguish had at last spurred [Linton]81-edgar to incur the risk of liberating [her]56-catherine . [She]56-catherine heard [the men]1087-the men [I]2253-i sent , disputing at the door , and [she]56-catherine gathered the sense of [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff 's answer . It drove [her]56-catherine desperate — [Linton]81-edgar , who had been conveyed up to [the little parlour]4650-the little parlour soon after [I]2253-i left , was terrified into fetching the key before [[his]81-edgar father]518-his father re - ascended . [He]81-edgar had the cunning to unlock , and re - lock the door , without shutting it ; and when [he]81-edgar should have gone to bed , [he]81-edgar begged to sleep with [Hareton]47-hareton , and [his]81-edgar petition was granted , for once . [Catherine]56-catherine stole out before break of day . [She]56-catherine dare not try the doors , lest the dogs should raise an alarm ; [she]56-catherine visited [the empty chambers]4652-the empty chambers , and examined [their]4652-the empty chambers windows ; and , luckily , lighting on [[her]56-catherine mother]1556-her mother 's , [she]56-catherine got easily out of [its]1556-her mother lattice , and onto the ground , by means of the fir tree , close by . [[Her]56-catherine accomplice]4654-her accomplice suffered for [his]4654-her accomplice share in the escape , notwithstanding [his]4654-her accomplice timid contrivances . The evening after the funeral , [[my]2253-i young lady]3319-my young lady and [I]2253-i were seated in [the library]3270-the library ; now musing mournfully , one of [us]4657-us despairingly , on [our]4657-us loss ; now venturing conjectures as to the gloomy future . [We]4657-us had just agreed the best destiny which could await [Catherine]56-catherine , would be a permission to continue resident at [the Grange]73-mr. linton , at least , during [Linton]56-catherine 's life : [he]4654-her accomplice being allowed to join [her]56-catherine [there]2637-there , and [I]2253-i to remain as [housekeeper]4659-housekeeper . That seemed rather too favourable an arrangement to be hoped for , and yet [I]2253-i did hope , and began to cheer up under the prospect of retaining [[my]2253-i home]814-my home , and [my]2253-i employment , and , above all , [[my]2253-i beloved young mistress]4661-my beloved young mistress , when [a servant]269-a servant — [one of [the discarded ones , not yet departed]4664-the discarded ones , not yet departed]4663-one of the discarded ones , not yet departed — rushed hastily in , and said , "[2253-i] that devil [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff " was coming through [the court]180-the court , should [he]43-heathcliff fasten the door in [his]43-heathcliff face ? If [we]4666-we had been mad enough to order that proceeding , [we]4666-we had not time . [He]4654-her accomplice made no ceremony of knocking , or announcing [his]4654-her accomplice name ; [he]4654-her accomplice was [master]2968-master , and availed [himself]4654-her accomplice of [the master]430-the master 's privilege to walk straight in , without saying a word . The sound of [[our]4666-we informant]4669-our informant 's voice directed [him]4654-her accomplice to [the library]3270-the library : [he]4654-her accomplice entered ; and motioning [him]4654-her accomplice out , shut the door . It was [the same room into which [he]4654-her accomplice had been ushered , as [a guest]4672-a guest , eighteen years before]4671-the same room into which he had been ushered , as a guest , eighteen years before : the same moon shone through the window ; and the same autumn landscape lay outside . [We]4666-we had not yet lighted a candle , but all [the apartment]195-the apartment was visible , even to the portraits on the wall — the splendid head of [Mrs. Linton]48-mrs. linton , and [the graceful one of [[her]48-mrs. linton husband]2614-her husband]4674-the graceful one of her husband . [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff advanced to the hearth . Time had little altered [his]43-heathcliff person either . There was [the same man]4676-the same man ; [his]43-heathcliff dark face rather sallower , and more composed , [his]43-heathcliff frame a stone or two heavier , perhaps , and no other difference . [Catherine]56-catherine had risen with an impulse to dash out , when [she]56-catherine saw [him]43-heathcliff . "[43-heathcliff] Stop ! " [he]0-i said , arresting [her]56-catherine by the arm . "[43-heathcliff] No more runnings away ! Where would [you]2256-you go ? [I]0-i 'm come to fetch [you]2256-you [home]239-home ; and [I]0-i hope [you]2256-you 'll be [a dutiful daughter]2258-a dutiful daughter , and not encourage [[my]0-i son]299-my son to further disobedience . [I]0-i was embarrassed how to punish [him]299-my son , when [I]0-i discovered [his]299-my son part in the business — [he]299-my son 's such [a cobweb]2260-a cobweb , a pinch would annihilate [him]299-my son — but , [you]2256-you 'll see by [his]299-my son look that [he]299-my son has received [his]299-my son due ! [I]0-i brought [him]299-my son down one evening , the day before yesterday , and just set [him]299-my son in a chair , and never touched [him]299-my son afterwards . [I]0-i sent [Hareton]47-hareton out , and [we]2261-we had [the room]243-the room to [ourselves]2261-we .
