In two hours , [I]0-i called [Joseph]45-joseph to carry [him]299-my son up again ; and , since then , [my]0-i presence is as potent on [his]299-my son nerves , as a ghost ; and [I]0-i fancy [he]299-my son sees [me]0-i often , though [I]0-i am not near , [Hareton]47-hareton says [he]299-my son wakes and shrieks in the night by the hour together ; and calls [you]2263-you to protect [him]299-my son from [me]0-i ; and , whether [you]2263-you like [[your]2263-you precious mate]2264-your precious mate or not , [you]2263-you must come — [he]299-my son 's [your]2263-you concern now ; [I]0-i yield all [my]0-i interest in [him]299-my son to [you]2263-you . " "[0-i] Why not let [Catherine]56-catherine continue [here]2574-here ? " [I]56-catherine pleaded , "[56-catherine] and send [Master Linton]73-mr. linton to [her]56-catherine . As [you]2263-you hate [them]2266-them both , [you]2263-you 'd not miss [them]2266-them — they can only be a daily plague to [your]2263-you un - natural heart . " "[0-i] [I]0-i 'm seeking a tenant for [the Grange]73-mr. linton , " [he]0-i answered ; "[0-i] and [I]0-i want [[my]0-i children]624-my children about [me]0-i , to be sure — besides [that lass]2268-that lass owes [me]0-i [her]2268-that lass services for [her]2268-that lass bread ; [I]0-i 'm not going to nurture [her]2268-that lass in luxury and idleness after [Linton]73-mr. linton is gone . Make haste and get ready now . And do n't oblige [me]0-i to compel [you]2263-you . " "[0-i] [I]0-i shall , " said [Catherine]56-catherine . "[0-i] [Linton]56-catherine is all [I]0-i have to love in [the world]267-the world , and , though [you]2263-you have done what [you]2263-you could to make [him]73-mr. linton hateful to [me]0-i , and [me]0-i to [him]73-mr. linton , [you]2263-you can not make [us]2270-us hate [each other]313-each other ! and [I]0-i defy [you]2263-you to hurt [him]73-mr. linton when [I]0-i am by , and [I]0-i defy [you]2263-you to frighten [me]0-i . " "[0-i] [You]2263-you are [a boastful champion]2272-a boastful champion ! " replied [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff ; "[2263-you] but [I]0-i do n't like [you]2263-you well enough to hurt [him]73-mr. linton — [you]2263-you shall get the full benefit of the torment , as long as it lasts . It is not [I]0-i who will make [him]73-mr. linton hateful to [you]2263-you — it is [his]73-mr. linton own sweet spirit . [He]73-mr. linton 's as bitter as gall at [your]2263-you desertion , and its consequences — don't expect thanks for this noble devotion . [I]0-i heard [him]73-mr. linton draw a pleasant picture to [Zillah]49-zillah of what [he]73-mr. linton would do , if [he]73-mr. linton were as strong as [I]0-i — the inclination is there , and [his]73-mr. linton very weakness will sharpen [his]73-mr. linton wits to find a substitute for strength . " "[0-i] [I]0-i know [he]73-mr. linton has a bad nature , " [Catherine]56-catherine ; "[73-mr. linton] [he]73-mr. linton 's [[your]0-i son]1767-your son . But [I]0-i 'm glad [I]0-i 've a better , to forgive it ; and [I]0-i know [he]73-mr. linton loves [me]0-i and for that reason [I]0-i love [him]73-mr. linton . [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff , [you]43-heathcliff have [nobody]442-nobody to love [you]43-heathcliff ; and , however miserable [you]43-heathcliff make [us]2275-us , [we]2275-us shall still have the revenge of thinking that [your]43-heathcliff cruelty rises from [your]43-heathcliff greater misery ! [You]43-heathcliff are miserable , are [you]43-heathcliff not ? Lonely , like the devil , and envious like [him]73-mr. linton ? [Nobody]442-nobody loves [you]43-heathcliff — [nobody]442-nobody will cry for [you]43-heathcliff , when [you]43-heathcliff die ! [I]0-i would n't be [you]43-heathcliff ! " [Catherine]56-catherine spoke with a kind of dreary triumph : [she]56-catherine seemed to have made up [her]56-catherine mind to enter into the spirit of [[her]56-catherine future family]4677-her future family , and draw pleasure from the griefs of [[her]56-catherine enemies]4678-her enemies . "[0-i] [You]43-heathcliff shall be sorry to be [yourself]43-heathcliff presently , " said [[her]56-catherine father - in - law]4679-her father - in - law . "[43-heathcliff] If [you]43-heathcliff stand there another minute . Begone , [witch]2278-witch , and get [your]43-heathcliff things . " [She]56-catherine scornfully withdrew . In [her]56-catherine absence , [I]0-i began to beg for [[Zillah]49-zillah 's place]4680-zillah 's place at [the Heights]568-the heights , offering to resign [her]49-zillah mine ; but [he]0-i would suffer it on no account . [He]0-i bid [me]0-i be silent , and then , for the first time , allowed [himself]0-i a glance round [the room]243-the room , and a look at the pictures . Having studied [Mrs. Linton]48-mrs. linton , [he]0-i said — "[0-i] [I]0-i shall have that at [home]239-home . Not because [I]0-i need it , but — " [He]0-i turned abruptly to the fire , and continued , with what , for lack of a better word , [I]0-i must call a smile — "[0-i] [I]0-i 'll tell [you]2280-you what [I]0-i did yesterday ! [I]0-i got [the sexton]2281-the sexton , who was digging [[Linton]48-mrs. linton 's grave]2282-linton 's grave , to remove the earth off [her]48-mrs. linton coffin lid , and [I]0-i opened it . [I]0-i thought , once , [I]0-i would have stayed [there]2637-there , when [I]0-i saw [her]48-mrs. linton face again — it is [hers]48-mrs. linton yet — [he]2281-the sexton had hard work to stir [me]0-i ; but [he]2281-the sexton said it would change , if the air blew on it , and so [I]0-i struck one side of the coffin loose — and covered it up — not [Linton]48-mrs. linton 's side , damn [him]2281-the sexton ! [I]0-i wish [he]2281-the sexton 'd been soldered in lead — and [I]0-i bribed [the sexton]2281-the sexton to pull it away , when [I]0-i 'm laid there , and slide mine out too , [I]0-i 'll have it made so , and then , by the time [Linton]48-mrs. linton gets to [us]2285-us , [he]2281-the sexton 'll not know which is which ! " "[2281-the sexton] [You]2281-the sexton were very wicked , [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff ! " [I]2281-the sexton exclaimed ; "[2281-the sexton] were [you]2281-the sexton not ashamed to disturb the dead ? " "[2281-the sexton] [I]0-i disturbed [nobody]442-nobody , [Nelly]80-ellen , " [he]2281-the sexton replied ; "[0-i] and [I]0-i gave some ease to [myself]0-i . [I]0-i shall be a great deal more comfortable now ; and [you]2287-you 'll have a better chance of keeping [me]0-i underground , when [I]0-i get [there]2637-there . Disturbed [her]2289-her ? No ! [she]2289-her has disturbed [me]0-i , night and day , through eighteen years — incessantly — remorselessly — till yesternight — and yesternight , [I]0-i was tranquil . [I]0-i dreamt [I]0-i was sleeping the last sleep , by that sleeper , with [my]0-i heart stopped , and [my]0-i cheek frozen against [hers]2289-her . " "[0-i] And if [she]2289-her had been dissolved into [earth]2805-earth , or worse , what would [you]0-i have dreamt of then ? " [I]0-i said . "[0-i] Of dissolving with [her]2289-her , and being more happy still ! " [he]0-i answered . "[0-i] Do [you]2287-you suppose [I]0-i dread any change of that sort ? [I]0-i expected such a transformation on raising the lid , but [I]0-i 'm better pleased that it should not commence till [I]0-i share it . Besides , unless [I]0-i had received a distinct impression of [her]2289-her passionless features , that strange feeling would hardly have been removed . It began oddly . [You]2287-you know , [I]0-i was wild after [she]2289-her died , and eternally , from dawn to dawn , praying [her]2289-her to return to [me]0-i — [her]2289-her spirit — [I]0-i have a strong faith in ghosts ; [I]0-i have a conviction that [they]2291-they can , and do exist , among [us]2292-us ! " The day [she]2289-her was buried there came a fall of snow . In the evening [I]0-i went to [the churchyard]4419-the churchyard . It blew bleak as winter — all round was solitary : [I]0-i did n't fear that [[her]2289-her fool of [a husband]1986-a husband]4684-her fool of a husband would wander up [the den]4686-the den so late — and [no one else]1563-no one else had business to bring [them]4684-her fool of a husband there . "[0-i] Being alone , and conscious two yards of loose earth was the sole barrier between [us]2292-us , [I]0-i said to [myself]0-i — " ' [I]0-i 'll have [her]2289-her in [my]0-i arms again ! If [she]2289-her be cold , [I]0-i 'll think it is this north wind that chills [me]0-i , and if [she]2289-her be motionless , it is sleep . ' "[0-i] [I]0-i got a spade from [the toolhouse]2293-the toolhouse , and began to delve with all [my]0-i might — it scraped the coffin ; [I]0-i fell to work with [my]0-i hands ; the wood commenced cracking about the screws , [I]0-i was on the point of attaining [my]0-i object , when it seemed that [I]0-i heard a sigh from some one above , close at the edge of [the grave]3080-the grave , and bending down.—'If [I]0-i can only get this off , ' muttered , ' [I]0-i wish [they]2295-they may shovel in the earth over [us]2296-us both ! ' and [I]0-i wrenched at it more desperately still . There was another sigh , close at [my]0-i ear . [I]0-i appeared to feel the warm breath of it displacing the sleet - laden wind . [I]0-i knew no living thing in flesh and blood was by — but as certainly as [you]2297-you perceive the approach to [some substantial body in the dark]2298-some substantial body in the dark , though it can not be discerned , so certainly [I]0-i felt that [Cathy]56-catherine was there , not under [me]0-i , but on [the earth]247-the earth . " A sudden sense of relief flowed , from [my]56-catherine heart , through every limb . [I]56-catherine relinquished [my]56-catherine labour of agony , and turned consoled at once , unspeakably consoled . [Her]56-catherine presence was with [me]56-catherine ; it remained while [I]56-catherine re - filled [the grave]3080-the grave , and led [me]56-catherine [home]239-home . [You]2297-you may laugh , if [you]2297-you will , but [I]56-catherine was sure [I]56-catherine should see [her]56-catherine [there]2637-there . [I]56-catherine was sure [she]56-catherine was with [me]56-catherine , and [I]56-catherine could not help talking to [her]56-catherine . "[56-catherine] Having reached the Heights , [I]0-i rushed eagerly to the door . It was fastened ; and , [I]0-i remember , that [accursed Earnshaw]47-hareton and [[my]0-i wife]1941-my wife opposed [my]0-i entrance . [I]0-i remember stopping to kick the breath out of [him]47-hareton , and then hurrying up [stairs]416-stairs , to [[my]0-i room]415-my room , and [hers]1941-my wife — [I]0-i looked round impatiently — [I]0-i felt [her]1941-my wife by [me]0-i — [I]0-i could almost see [her]1941-my wife , and yet [I]0-i could not ! [I]0-i ought to have sweat blood then , from the anguish of [my]0-i yearning , from the fervour of [my]0-i supplications to have but one glimpse ! [I]0-i had not one . [She]1941-my wife showed [herself]1941-my wife , as [she]1941-my wife often was in life , a devil to [me]0-i ! And , since then , sometimes more , and sometimes less , [I]0-i 've been the sport of that intolerable torture ! Infernal — keeping [my]0-i nerves at such a stretch , that , if they had not resembled catgut , [they]2303-they would , long ago , have relaxed to the feebleness of [Linton]56-catherine 's . " When [I]56-catherine sat in [the house]185-the house with [Hareton]47-hareton , it seemed that on going out , [I]56-catherine should meet [her]1941-my wife ; when [I]56-catherine walked on [the moors]352-the moors [I]56-catherine should meet [her]1941-my wife coming in . When [I]56-catherine went from [home]239-home , [I]56-catherine hastened to return , [she]1941-my wife must be somewhere at [the Heights]11-wuthering heights , [I]56-catherine was certain ! And when [I]56-catherine slept in [[her]1941-my wife chamber]2833-her chamber — [I]56-catherine was beaten out of that — [I]56-catherine could n't lie there ; for the moment [I]56-catherine closed [my]56-catherine eyes , [she]1941-my wife was either outside the window , or sliding back the panels , or entering [the room]243-the room , or even resting [her]1941-my wife darling head on the same pillow as [she]1941-my wife did when [a child]265-a child . And [I]56-catherine must open [my]56-catherine lids to see . And so [I]56-catherine opened and closed them a hundred times a - night — to be always disappointed ! It racked [me]56-catherine ! [I]56-catherine 've often groaned aloud , till [that old rascal Joseph]4697-that old rascal joseph , no doubt believed that [my]56-catherine conscience was playing [the fiend inside of [me]56-catherine]4698-the fiend inside of me . "[56-catherine] Now since [I]0-i 've seen [her]2304-her , [I]0-i 'm pacified — a little . It was a strange way of killing , not by inches , but by fractions of hair - breadths , to beguile [me]0-i with the spectre of a hope , through eighteen years ! " [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff paused and wiped [his]43-heathcliff forehead — [his]43-heathcliff hair clung to it , wet with perspiration ; [his]43-heathcliff eyes were fixed on the red embers of the fire ; the brows not contracted , but raised next the temples , diminishing the grim aspect of [his]43-heathcliff countenance , but imparting a peculiar look of trouble , and a painful appearance of mental tension towards one absorbing subject . [He]43-heathcliff only half addressed [me]56-catherine , and [I]56-catherine maintained silence — [I]56-catherine did n't like to hear [him]43-heathcliff talk ! After a short period , [he]43-heathcliff resumed [his]43-heathcliff meditation on the picture , took it down , and leant it against the sofa to contemplate it at better advantage ; and while so occupied [Catherine]56-catherine entered , announcing that [she]56-catherine was ready , when [her]56-catherine pony should be saddled . "[56-catherine] Send that over to - morrow , " said [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff to [me]56-catherine , then turning to [her]56-catherine [he]43-heathcliff added , "[56-catherine] [You]2305-you may do without [your]2305-you pony — it is a fine evening , and [you]2305-you 'll need no ponies at [Wuthering Heights]11-wuthering heights , for what journies [you]2305-you take , [your]2305-you own feet will serve [you]2305-you — Come along . " "[56-catherine] Good - bye , [Ellen]80-ellen ! " whispered [[my]80-ellen dear little mistress]4699-my dear little mistress . As [she]4699-my dear little mistress kissed [me]80-ellen , [her]4699-my dear little mistress lips felt like ice . "[80-ellen] Come and see [me]0-i [Ellen]80-ellen , do n't forget . " "[80-ellen] Take care [you]80-ellen do no such thing , [Mrs. Dean]71-mrs. dean ! " said [[her]80-ellen new father]4700-her new father . "[71-mrs. dean] When [I]0-i wish to speak to [you]80-ellen [I]0-i 'll come [here]2574-here . [I]0-i want none of [your]80-ellen prying at [[my]0-i house]1773-my house ! " [He]0-i signed [her]80-ellen to precede [him]0-i ; and casting back a look that cut [my]80-ellen heart , [she]80-ellen obeyed . [I]80-ellen watched [them]4701-them from the window , walk down [the garden]2718-the garden . [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff fixed [Catherine]56-catherine 's arm under [his]43-heathcliff , though [she]56-catherine disputed the act , at first , evidently , and with rapid strides , [he]43-heathcliff hurried [her]56-catherine into [the alley]4703-the alley , whose trees concealed them . [I]80-ellen have paid a visit to [the Heights]568-the heights , but [I]80-ellen have not seen [her]56-catherine since [she]56-catherine left ; [Joseph]45-joseph held the door in [his]45-joseph hand , when [I]80-ellen called to ask after [her]56-catherine , and would n't let [me]80-ellen pass . [He]45-joseph said [Mrs. Linton]48-mrs. linton was "[80-ellen] thrang , " and [the master]430-the master was not in . [Zillah]49-zillah has told [me]80-ellen something of the way [they]4706-they go on , otherwise [I]80-ellen should hardly know who was dead , and who living . [She]49-zillah thinks [Catherine]56-catherine , haughty , and does not like [her]56-catherine , [I]80-ellen can guess by [her]49-zillah talk . [[My]80-ellen young lady]3319-my young lady asked some aid of [her]56-catherine , when [she]56-catherine first came , but [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff told [her]56-catherine to follow [her]56-catherine own business , and let [[his]43-heathcliff daughter - in - law]2712-his daughter - in - law look after [herself]56-catherine , and [Zillah]49-zillah willingly acquiesced , being [a narrow - minded selfish woman]4709-a narrow - minded selfish woman . [Catherine]56-catherine evinced [a child]265-a child 's annoyance at this neglect ; repaid it with contempt , and thus enlisted [[my]80-ellen informant]3448-my informant among [[her]56-catherine enemies]4678-her enemies , as securely as if [she]56-catherine had done [her]56-catherine some great wrong . [I]80-ellen had a long talk with [Zillah]49-zillah , about six weeks ago , a little before [you]4713-you came , one day , when [we]4714-we foregathered on [the moor]389-the moor ; and this is what [she]49-zillah told [me]80-ellen . "[80-ellen] The first thing [Mrs. Linton]48-mrs. linton did , " [she]48-mrs. linton said , "[48-mrs. linton] on [her]48-mrs. linton arrival at [the Heights]568-the heights , was to run up [- stairs]781-- stairs without even wishing good - evening to [me]0-i and [Joseph]45-joseph ; [she]48-mrs. linton shut [herself]48-mrs. linton into [[Linton]48-mrs. linton 's room]4393-linton 's room , and remained till morning — then , while [the master]430-the master and [Earnshaw]47-hareton were at breakfast , [she]48-mrs. linton entered [the house]185-the house and asked all in a quiver if [the doctor]528-the doctor might be sent for ? [[her]48-mrs. linton cousin]462-her cousin was very ill . " "[48-mrs. linton] [We]2315-we know that ! " answered [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff , "[48-mrs. linton] but [his]462-her cousin life is not worth a farthing , and [I]0-i wo n't spend a farthing on [him]462-her cousin . " "[0-i] But [I]0-i can not tell how to do , " [she]48-mrs. linton said , "[0-i] and if [nobody]442-nobody will help [me]0-i , [he]462-her cousin 'll die ! " "[462-her cousin] Walk out of [the room]243-the room ! " cried [the master]430-the master , "[462-her cousin] and let [me]0-i never hear a word more about [him]462-her cousin ! None here care what becomes of [him]462-her cousin ; if [you]2318-you do , act [the nurse]2319-the nurse ; if [you]2318-you do not , lock [him]462-her cousin up and leave [him]462-her cousin . " Then [she]48-mrs. linton began to bother [me]2319-the nurse , and [I]2319-the nurse said [I]2319-the nurse 'd had enough plague with the tiresome thing ; [we]4717-we each had [our]4717-we tasks , and [hers]48-mrs. linton was to wait on [Linton]48-mrs. linton , [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff bid [me]2319-the nurse leave that labour to [her]48-mrs. linton . How [they]4718-they managed together , [I]2319-the nurse ca n't tell . [I]2319-the nurse fancy [he]462-her cousin fretted a great deal , and moaned hisseln , night and day ; and [she]48-mrs. linton had precious little rest , one could guess by [her]48-mrs. linton white face , and heavy eyes — [she]48-mrs. linton sometimes came into [the kitchen]194-the kitchen all wildered like , and looked as if [she]48-mrs. linton would fain beg assistance : but [I]2319-the nurse was not going to disobey [the master]430-the master — [I]2319-the nurse never dare disobey [him]430-the master , [Mrs. Dean]71-mrs. dean , and though [I]2319-the nurse thought it wrong that [Kenneth]158-doctor kenneth should not be sent for , it was no concern of [mine]2319-the nurse , either to advise or complain ; and [I]2319-the nurse always refused to meddle . Once or twice , after [we]4718-they had gone to bed , [I]2319-the nurse 've happened to open [my]2319-the nurse door again , and seen [her]48-mrs. linton sitting crying , on the stairs ' top ; and then [I]2319-the nurse 've shut [myself]2319-the nurse in , quick , for fear of being moved to interfere . [I]2319-the nurse did pity [her]48-mrs. linton then , [I]2319-the nurse 'm sure ; still [I]2319-the nurse did n't wish to lose [my]2319-the nurse place , [you]4721-you know ! At last , one night [she]48-mrs. linton came boldly into [[my]2319-the nurse chamber]2693-my chamber , and frightened [me]2319-the nurse out of [my]2319-the nurse wits , by saying "[2319-the nurse] Tell [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff that [[his]43-heathcliff son]475-his son is dying — [I'm]2321-i'm sure [he]475-his son is , this time.—Get up , instantly , and tell [him]475-his son ! " Having uttered this speech , [she]48-mrs. linton vanished again . [I]2322-i lay a quarter of an hour listening and trembling — Nothing stirred — [the house]185-the house was quiet . "[2322-i] [She]2322-i 's mistaken , [I]0-i said to [myself]0-i . [He]475-his son 's got over it . [I]0-i need n't disturb [them]2323-them . " And [I]0-i began to dose . But [my]0-i sleep was marred a second time , by a sharp ringing of the bell — the only bell [we]2323-them have , put up on purpose for [Linton]48-mrs. linton , and [the master]430-the master called to [me]0-i , to see what was the matter , and inform [them]2323-them that [he]475-his son would n't have that noise repeated . "[0-i] [I]0-i delivered [Catherine]56-catherine 's message . [He]475-his son cursed to [himself]475-his son , and in a few minutes , came out with a lighted candle , and proceeded to [[their]2323-them room]503-their room . [I]0-i followed — [Mrs. Heathcliff]48-mrs. linton was seated by the bedside , with [her]48-mrs. linton hands folded on [her]48-mrs. linton knees . [[Her]48-mrs. linton father - in - law]4679-her father - in - law went up , held the light to [Linton]48-mrs. linton 's face , looked at [him]475-his son , and touched [him]475-his son , afterwards [he]475-his son turned to [her]56-catherine . " ' Now — [Catherine]56-catherine , ' [he]475-his son said , ' how do [you]56-catherine feel ? ' "[475-his son] [She]56-catherine was dumb . ' " How do [you]56-catherine feel , [Catherine]56-catherine ? ' [he]475-his son repeated . ' "[56-catherine] [He]475-his son 's safe , and [I]0-i 'm free , ' [she]56-catherine answered , ' [I]0-i should feel well — but , ' [she]56-catherine continued with a bitterness [she]56-catherine could n't conceal , ' [You]4679-her father - in - law have left [me]0-i so long to struggle against death , alone , that [I]0-i feel and see only death ! [I]0-i feel like death ! ' " And [she]56-catherine looked like it , too ! [I]2326-i gave [her]56-catherine a little wine . [Hareton]47-hareton and [Joseph who had been wakened by the ringing , and the sound of feet]4725-joseph who had been wakened by the ringing , and the sound of feet , and heard [our]4726-our talk from outside , now entered . [Joseph]45-joseph was fain , [I]2326-i believe , of [the lad]2768-the lad 's removal : [Hareton]47-hareton seemed a thought bothered , though [he]47-hareton was more taken up with staring at [Catherine]56-catherine than thinking of [Linton]56-catherine . But [the master]430-the master bid [him]47-hareton get off to bed again — [we]4726-our did n't want [his]2326-i help . [He]2326-i afterwards made [Joseph]45-joseph remove the body to [[his]2326-i chamber]505-his chamber , and told [me]2326-i to return to [mine]2326-i , and [Mrs. Heathcliff]48-mrs. linton remained by [herself]48-mrs. linton . "[2326-i] In the morning , [he]2326-i sent [me]0-i to tell [her]2327-her [she]2327-her must come down to breakfast — [she]2327-her had undressed , and appeared going to sleep ; and said [she]2327-her was ill ; at which [I]0-i hardly wondered . [I]0-i informed [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff , and [he]43-heathcliff replied , " ' Well , let [her]2327-her be till after the funeral ; and go up dow and then to get [her]2327-her what is needful ; and as soon as [she]2327-her seems better , tell [me]43-heathcliff . ' [Cathy]56-catherine stayed up - stairs a fortnight , according to [Zillah]49-zillah , who visited [her]56-catherine twice a - day , and would have been rather more friendly , but [her]56-catherine attempts at increasing kindness were proudly and promptly repelled . [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff went up once , to show [her]2327-her [Linton]56-catherine 's will . [He]43-heathcliff had bequeathed the whole of [his]43-heathcliff , and what had been [her]2327-her moveable property to [[his]43-heathcliff father]518-his father . [The poor creature]4731-the poor creature was threatened , or coaxed into that act , during [her]2327-her week 's absence , when [[his]43-heathcliff uncle]4030-his uncle died . [The lands]4733-the lands , being a minor [he]43-heathcliff could not meddle with . However , [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff has claimed , and kept them in [[his]43-heathcliff wife]2670-his wife 's right , and [his]43-heathcliff also — [I]43-heathcliff suppose legally , at any rate [Catherine]56-catherine , destitute of cash and [friends]3176-friends , can not disturb [his]43-heathcliff possession . "[43-heathcliff] [Nobody]442-nobody , " said [Zillah]49-zillah , "[442-nobody] ever approached [her]2329-her door , except that once , but [I.]2330-i. . .and [nobody]442-nobody asked anything about [her]2329-her . The first occasion of [her]2329-her coming down into [the house]185-the house , was on a Sunday afternoon . " [She]2329-her had cried out , when [I]45-joseph carried up [her]2329-her dinner that [she]2329-her could n't bear any longer being in the cold ; and [I]45-joseph told [her]2329-her [the master]430-the master was going to [Thrushcross Grange]73-mr. linton ; and [Earnshaw]47-hareton and [I]45-joseph need n't hinder [her]2329-her from descending ; so , as soon as [she]2329-her heard [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff 's horse trot off , [she]2329-her made [her]2329-her appearance , donned in black , and [her]2329-her yellow curls combed back behind [her]2329-her ears , as plain as [a quaker]4737-a quaker , [she]2329-her could n't comb them out . "[45-joseph] [Joseph]45-joseph , and [I]0-i generally go to [chapel]2333-chapel on Sundays , ( [the Kirk]2334-the kirk , [you]2335-you know , has [no minister]2336-no minister , now , explained [Mrs. Dean]71-mrs. dean , and [they]2337-they call [the Methodists]2338-the methodists ' or [[Baptists]2339-baptists ' place]2340-baptists ' place , [I]0-i ca n't say which it is , at [Gimmerton]14-gimmerton , [a chapel]2341-a chapel . ) " [Joseph]45-joseph had gone , "[71-mrs. dean] [she]71-mrs. dean continued , " but [I]71-mrs. dean thought proper to bide at [home]239-home . [Young folks]4739-young folks are always the better for [an elder]4740-an elder 's over - looking , and [Hareton]47-hareton with all [his]47-hareton bashfulness , is n't [a model of nice behaviour]4741-a model of nice behaviour . [I]71-mrs. dean let [him]2342-his know that [[his]2342-his cousin]4033-his cousin would very likely sit with [us]4743-us , and [she]2343-i had been always used to see [the Sabbath respected]4744-the sabbath respected , so [he]2342-his had as good leave [his]2342-his guns , and bits of in - door work alone , while [she]2343-i stayed . "[71-mrs. dean] [He]2342-his coloured up at the news ; and cast [his]2342-his eyes over [his]2342-his hands and clothes . The train - oil , and gunpowder were shoved out of sight in a minute . [I]0-i saw [he]2342-his meant to give [her]2343-i [his]2342-his company ; and [I]0-i guessed , by [his]2342-his way , [he]2342-his wanted to be presentable ; so , laughing , as [I]0-i durst not laugh when [the master]430-the master is by , [I]0-i offered to help [him]2342-his , if [he]2342-his would , and joked at [his]2342-his confusion . [He]2342-his grew sullen , and began to swear . " Now , [Mrs. Dean]71-mrs. dean , "[2343-i] [she]2343-i went on , seeing [me]0-i not pleased by [her]2343-i manner , " [you]0-i happen think [[your]0-i young lady]3454-your young lady too fine for [Mr. Hareton]47-hareton , and happen [you]0-i 're right — but , [I]2343-i own , [I]2343-i should love well to bring [her]3454-your young lady pride a peg lower . And what will all [her]3454-your young lady learning and [her]3454-your young lady daintiness do for [her]3454-your young lady , now ? [She]3454-your young lady 's as poor as [you]0-i , or [I]2343-i — poorer — [I'll]2343-i be bound , [you]0-i 're saving — and [I]2343-i 'm doing [my]2343-i little all , [that road]4746-that road . "[2343-i] [Hareton]47-hareton allowed [Zillah]49-zillah to give [him]47-hareton [her]49-zillah aid ; and [she]49-zillah flattered [him]47-hareton into a good humour ; so , when [Catherine]56-catherine came , half forgetting [her]56-catherine former insults , [he]47-hareton tried to make [himself]47-hareton agreeable , by [the house - keeper]2345-the house - keeper 's account . " [Missis]120-missis walked in , "[49-zillah] [she]49-zillah said , " as chill as an icicle , and as high as [a princess]4747-a princess . got up and offered [her]49-zillah [my]49-zillah seat in the arm«chair . No , [she]49-zillah turned up [her]49-zillah nose at [my]49-zillah civility . [Earnshaw]47-hareton rose too , and bid [her]49-zillah come to [the settle]799-the settle , and sit close by the fire ; [he]47-hareton was sure [she]49-zillah was starved . "[49-zillah] ' [I]0-i 've been starved a month and more , ' [she]49-zillah answered , resting on the word , as scornful as [she]49-zillah could . " And [she]49-zillah got a chair for [herself]49-zillah , and placed it at a distance from both of [us]4749-us . "[49-zillah] Having sat till [she]49-zillah was warm , [she]49-zillah began to look round , and discovered a number of books in the dresser ; [she]49-zillah was instantly upon [her]49-zillah feet again , stretching to reach them , but they were too high up . " [[Her]49-zillah cousin]462-her cousin , after watching [her]49-zillah endeavours a while , at last summoned courage to help [her]49-zillah ; [she]49-zillah held [her]49-zillah frock , and [he]2768-the lad filled it with the first that came to hand . "[49-zillah] That was a great advance for [the lad]2768-the lad — [she]49-zillah did n't thank [him]2768-the lad ; still , [he]2768-the lad felt gratified that [she]49-zillah had accepted [his]2768-the lad assistance , and ventured to stand behind as [she]49-zillah examined them , and even to stoop and point out what struck [bis]2347-bis fancy in certain old pictures which they contained — nor was [he]2768-the lad daunted by the saucy style in which [she]49-zillah jerked the page from [his]2768-the lad finger ; [he]2768-the lad contented [himself]2768-the lad with going a bit farther back , and looking at [her]49-zillah , instead of the book . " [She]49-zillah continued reading , or seeking for something to read . [His]2768-the lad attention became , by degrees , quite centred in the study of [her]49-zillah thick , silky curls — [her]49-zillah face [he]2768-the lad could n't see , and [she]49-zillah could n't see [him]2768-the lad . And , perhaps , not quite awake to what [he]2768-the lad did , but attracted like [a child]265-a child to a candle , at last , [he]2768-the lad proceeded from staring to touching ; [he]2768-the lad put out [his]2768-the lad hand and stroked one curl , as gently as if it were a bird . [He]2768-the lad might have stuck a knife into [her]49-zillah neck , [she]49-zillah started round in such a taking . "[49-zillah] ' Get away , this moment ! How dare [you]2768-the lad touch [me]0-i ? Why are [you]2768-the lad stopping [there]2637-there ? ' [she]49-zillah cried , in a tone of disgust . ' [I]0-i ca n't endure [you]2768-the lad ! [I]0-i 'll go up [stairs]416-stairs again , if [you]2768-the lad come near [me]0-i . ' " [Mr. Hareton]47-hareton recoiled , looking as foolish as [he]47-hareton could do ; [he]47-hareton sat down in [the settle]799-the settle , very quiet , and [she]49-zillah continued turning over [her]49-zillah volumes , another half hour — finally , [Earnshaw]47-hareton crossed over , and whispered to [me]2768-the lad . "[2768-the lad] ' Will [you]2768-the lad ask [her]49-zillah to read to [us]2350-us , [Zillah]49-zillah ? [I]0-i 'm stalled of doing naught — and [I]0-i do like — [I]0-i could like to hear [her]49-zillah ! dunnot say [I]0-i wanted it , but ask of yourseln . ' " ' [Mr. Hareton]47-hareton wishes [you]49-zillah would read to [us]2350-us , [ma'am]3167-ma'am , ' [I]49-zillah said , immediately . ' [He]47-hareton 'd take it very kind — he'd be much obliged . ' "[49-zillah] [She]49-zillah frowned ; and , looking up , answered , " ' [Mr. Hareton]47-hareton , and the whole set of [you]47-hareton will be good enough to understand that [I]49-zillah reject any pretence at kindness [you]47-hareton have the hypocricy to offer ! [I]49-zillah despise [you]47-hareton , and will have nothing to say to any of [you]47-hareton ! When [I]49-zillah would have given [my]49-zillah life for one kind word , even to see one of [your]47-hareton faces , [you]47-hareton all kept off . But [I]49-zillah wo n't complain to [you]47-hareton ! [I]49-zillah 'm driven down here by the cold , not either to amuse [you]47-hareton , or enjoy [your]47-hareton society . ' "[49-zillah] ' What could [I]0-i ha ' done ? ' began [Earnshaw]47-hareton . ' How was [I]0-i to blame ? ' " ' Oh ! [you]47-hareton are [an exception]4754-an exception , ' answered [Mrs. Heathcliff]48-mrs. linton . ' [I]0-i never missed such a concern as [you]47-hareton . ' "[0-i] ' But , [I]0-i offered more than once , and asked , ' [he]0-i said , kindling up at [her]2351-she pertness , ' [I]0-i asked [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff to let [me]0-i wake for [you]2351-she — ' " ' Be silent ! [I]47-hareton 'll go out of [doors]4755-doors , or anywhere , rather than have [your]47-hareton disagreeable voice in [my]47-hareton ear ! ' said [[my]47-hareton lady]1070-my lady . "[47-hareton] [Hareton]47-hareton muttered , [she]2351-she might go to hell , for [him]43-heathcliff ! and unslinging [his]47-hareton gun , restrained [himself]47-hareton from [his]47-hareton Sunday occupations , no longer . " [He]43-heathcliff talked now , freely enough ; and [she]2351-she presently saw fit to retreat to [her]2351-she solitude ; but the frost had set in , and , in spite of [her]2351-she pride , [she]2351-she was forced to condescend to [our]4757-our company , more and more . However , [I]47-hareton took care there should be no further scorning at [my]47-hareton good nature — ever since , [I]47-hareton 've been as stiff as [herself]2351-she — and [she]2351-she has [no lover]4758-no lover , or liker among [us]4757-our — and [she]2351-she does not deserve one — for , let [them]4759-them say the least word to [her]2351-she , and [she]2351-she 'll curl back without respect of [any one]2573-any one ! [She]2351-she 'll snap at [the master]430-the master [himself]430-the master ; and , as good as dares [him]430-the master to thrash [her]2351-she ; and the more hurt [she]2351-she gets , the more venomous [she]2351-she grows . "[47-hareton] At first , on hearing this account from [Zillah]49-zillah , [I]0-i determined to leave [my]0-i situation , take [a cottage]2947-a cottage , and get [Catherine]56-catherine to come and live with [me]0-i ; but [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff would as soon permit that , as [he]43-heathcliff would set up [Hareton]47-hareton in [an independent house]2353-an independent house ; and [I]0-i can see no remedy , at present , unless [she]56-catherine could marry again ; and that scheme , it does not come within [my]0-i province to arrange . " Thus ended [Mrs. Dean]71-mrs. dean 's story . Notwithstanding [the doctor]528-the doctor 's prophecy , [I]2354-i am rapidly recovering strength , and , though it be only the second week in January , [I]2354-i propose getting out on horseback , in a day or two , and riding over to [Wuthering Heights]11-wuthering heights , to inform [[my]2354-i landlord]168-my landlord that [I]2354-i shall spend the next six months in [London]6-london ; and , if [he]168-my landlord likes , [he]168-my landlord may look out for [another tenant]2655-another tenant to take [the place]188-the place , after October — [I]2354-i would not pass another winter here , for much . Yesterday was bright , calm , and frosty . [I]2354-i went to [the Heights]568-the heights as [I]2354-i proposed ; [[my]2354-i house - keeper]4767-my house - keeper entreated [me]2354-i to bear a little note from [her]4767-my house - keeper to [[her]4767-my house - keeper young lady]2205-her young lady , and [I]2354-i did not refuse , for [the worthy woman]471-the worthy woman was not conscious of anything odd in [her]471-the worthy woman request . The front door stood open , but the jealous gate was fastened , as at [my]2354-i last visit ; [I]2354-i knocked and invoked [Earnshaw]47-hareton from among the garden beds ; [he]47-hareton unchained it , and [I]2354-i entered . [The fellow]236-the fellow is as handsome [a rustic as need be seen]4771-a rustic as need be seen . [I]2354-i took particular notice of [him]236-the fellow this time ; but then , [he]236-the fellow does [his]236-the fellow best , apparently , to make the least of [his]236-the fellow advantages . [I]2354-i asked if [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff were at [home]239-home ? [He]236-the fellow answered , no ; but [he]236-the fellow would be in at dinner - time . It was eleven o'clock , and [I]2354-i announced [my]2354-i intention of going in , and waiting for [him]236-the fellow , at which [he]236-the fellow immediately flung down [his]236-the fellow tools and accompanied [me]2354-i , in [the office of watchdog]4773-the office of watchdog , not as a substitute for [the host]4774-the host . [We]4775-we entered together ; [Catherine]56-catherine was there , making [herself]56-catherine useful in preparing some vegetables for the approaching meal ; [she]56-catherine looked more sulky , and less spirited than when [I]2354-i had seen [her]56-catherine first . [She]56-catherine hardly raised [her]56-catherine eyes to notice [me]2354-i , and continued [her]56-catherine employment with the same disregard to common forms of politeness , as before ; never returning [my]2354-i bow and good morning , by the slightest acknowledgment . "[2354-i] [She]2354-i does not seem so amiable , " [I]2354-i thought , "[2354-i] as [Mrs. Dean]71-mrs. dean would persuade [me]0-i to believe . [She]2354-i 's [a beauty]632-a beauty , it is true ; but not [an angel]3219-an angel . " [Earnshaw]47-hareton surlily bid [her]2354-i remove [her]2354-i things to [the kitchen]194-the kitchen . "[2354-i] Remove them [yourself]2357-i , " [she]2354-i said ; pushing them from [her]2354-i , as soon as [she]2354-i had done ; and retiring to a stool by the window , where [she]2354-i began to carve figures of birds and beasts , out of the turnip parings in [her]2354-i lap . [I]2357-i approached [her]2354-i , pretending to desire a view of [the garden]2718-the garden ; and , as [I]2357-i fancied , adroitly dropped [Mrs. Dean]71-mrs. dean 's note onto [her]2354-i knee , unnoticed by [Hareton]47-hareton — but [she]2354-i asked aloud — "[2357-i] What is that ? " And chucked it off . "[2354-i] A letter from [[your]2357-i old acquaintance]2358-your old acquaintance , [the housekeeper at [the Grange]2656-the grange]2359-the housekeeper at the grange , " [I]2358-your old acquaintance answered , annoyed at [her]2354-i exposing [my]2358-your old acquaintance kind deed , and fearful lest it should be imagined a missive of [my]2358-your old acquaintance own . [She]2354-i would gladly have gathered it up , at this information , but [Hareton]47-hareton beat [her]2354-i ; [he]47-hareton seized , and put it in [his]47-hareton waistcoat , saying [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff should look at it first . Thereat , [Catherine]56-catherine silently turned [her]56-catherine face from [us]4778-us , and , very stealthily , drew out [her]56-catherine pocket - handkerchief and applied it to [her]56-catherine eyes ; and [[her]56-catherine cousin]462-her cousin , after struggling a while to keep down [his]462-her cousin softer feelings , pulled out the letter and flung it on the floor beside [her]56-catherine as ungraciously as [he]462-her cousin could . [Catherine]56-catherine caught , and perused it eagerly ; then [she]56-catherine put a few questions to [me]2358-your old acquaintance concerning the inmates , rational and irrational , of [[her]56-catherine former home]3589-her former home ; and gazing towards [the hills]2957-the hills , murmured in soliloquy . "[2358-your old acquaintance] [I]0-i should like to be riding [Minny]134-minny down there ! [I]0-i should like to be climbing up there — Oh ! [I]0-i 'm tired — [I'm]0-i stalled , [Hareton]47-hareton ! " And [she]56-catherine leant [her]56-catherine pretty head back against the sill , with half a yawn and half a sigh , and lapsed into an aspect of abstracted sadness , neither caring , nor knowing whether [we]4782-we remarked [her]56-catherine . "[48-mrs. linton] [Mrs. Heathcliff]48-mrs. linton , " [I]48-mrs. linton said , after sitting some time mute , "[48-mrs. linton] [you]48-mrs. linton are not aware that [I]0-i am [an acquaintance of [yours]48-mrs. linton]2361-an acquaintance of yours ? so intimate , that [I]0-i think it strange [you]48-mrs. linton wo n't come and speak to [me]0-i . [[My]0-i housekeeper]2362-my housekeeper never wearies of talking about and praising [you]48-mrs. linton ; and [she]2362-my housekeeper 'll be greatly disappointed if [I]0-i return with no news of , or from [you]48-mrs. linton , except that [you]48-mrs. linton received [her]2362-my housekeeper letter , and said nothing ! " [She]2362-my housekeeper appeared to wonder at this speech and asked , "[48-mrs. linton] Does [Ellen]80-ellen like [you]0-i ? " "[48-mrs. linton] Yes , very well , " [I]48-mrs. linton replied unhesitatingly . "[48-mrs. linton] [You]0-i must tell [her]2362-my housekeeper , " [she]2362-my housekeeper continued , "[0-i] that [I]0-i would answer [her]2362-my housekeeper letter , but [I]0-i have no materials for writing , not even a book from which [I]0-i might tear a leaf . " "[2362-my housekeeper] No books ! " [I]2362-my housekeeper exclaimed . "[2362-my housekeeper] How do [you]0-i contrive to live [here]2574-here without them ? If [I]0-i may take the liberty to inquire — Though provided with [a large library]2364-a large library , [I]0-i 'm frequently very dull at the Grange — take [my]0-i books away , and [I]0-i should be desperate ! " "[0-i] [I]0-i was always reading , when [I]0-i had them ; " said [Catherine]56-catherine , "[0-i] and [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff never reads ; so [he]43-heathcliff took it into [his]43-heathcliff head to destroy [my]0-i books . [I]0-i have not had a glimpse of one , for weeks . Only once , [I]0-i searched through [Joseph]45-joseph 's store of theology ; to [his]43-heathcliff great irritation : and once , [Hareton]47-hareton , [I]0-i came upon a secret stock in [[your]47-hareton room]4350-your room . . .some Latin and Greek , and some tales and poetry ; [all old friends]2366-all old friends — [I]0-i brought [the last]2367-the last [here]2574-here — and [you]47-hareton gathered them , as [a magpie]2369-a magpie gathers silver spoons , for the mere love of stealing ! They are of no use to [you]47-hareton — or else [you]47-hareton concealed them in the bad spirit , that as [you]47-hareton can not enjoy them , [nobody else]1721-nobody else shall . Perhaps [your]47-hareton envy counselled [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff to rob [me]0-i of [my]0-i treasures ? But , [I]0-i 've most of them written on [my]0-i brain and printed in [my]0-i heart , and [you]47-hareton can not deprive [me]0-i of those ! " [Earnshaw]47-hareton blushed crimson , when [[his]47-hareton cousin]4033-his cousin made this revelation of [his]47-hareton private literary accumulations , and stammered an indignant denial of [her]4033-his cousin accusations . "[47-hareton] [Mr. Hareton]47-hareton is desirous of increasing [his]47-hareton amount of knowledge , " [I]47-hareton said , coming to [his]47-hareton rescue . "[47-hareton] [He]47-hareton is not envious but emulous o [your]47-hareton attainments — [He'll]47-hareton be [a clever scholar]2371-a clever scholar in a few years ! " "[47-hareton] And [he]47-hareton wants [me]0-i to sink into a dunce , meantime , " answered [Catherine]56-catherine . "[47-hareton] Yes , [I]0-i hear [him]47-hareton trying to spell and read to [himself]47-hareton , and pretty blunders [he]47-hareton makes ! [I]0-i wish [you]47-hareton would repeat [Chevy Chase]161-chevy chase , as [you]47-hareton did yesterday — It was extremely funny ! [I]0-i heard [you]47-hareton . . .and [I]0-i heard [you]47-hareton turning over the dictionary , to seek out the hard words , and then cursing , because [you]47-hareton could n't read [their]2372-their explanations ! " [The young man]259-the young man evidently thought it too bad that [he]259-the young man should be laughed at for [his]259-the young man ignorance , and then laughed at for trying to remove it . [I]47-hareton had a similar notion , and , remembering [Mrs. Dean]71-mrs. dean 's anecdote of [his]259-the young man first attempt at enlightening the darkness in which [he]259-the young man had been reared , [I]47-hareton observed , "[47-hareton] But , [Mrs. Heathcliff]48-mrs. linton , [we]2373-we have each had a commencement , and each stumbled and tottered on the threshold , and had [[our]2373-we teachers]2374-our teachers scorned , instead of aiding [us]2373-we , [we]2373-we should stumble and totter yet . " "[47-hareton] Oh ! " [she]71-mrs. dean replied , "[47-hareton] [I]0-i do n't wish to limit [his]47-hareton acquirements . . .still , [he]47-hareton has no right to appropriate what is [mine]0-i , and make it ridiculous to [me]0-i with [his]47-hareton vile mistakes and mis - pronunciations ! Those books , both prose and verse , were consecrated to [me]0-i by other associations , and [I]0-i hate to have them debased and profaned in [his]47-hareton mouth ! Besides , of all , [he]47-hareton has selected [my]0-i favourite pieces that [I]0-i love the most to repeat , as if out of deliberate malice ! " [Hareton]47-hareton 's chest heaved in silence a minute ; be laboured under a severe sense of mortification and wrath , which it was no easy task to suppress . [I]47-hareton rose , and from a gentlemanly idea of relieving [his]47-hareton embarrassment , took up [my]47-hareton station in the door - way surveying the external prospect , as [I]47-hareton stood . [He]47-hareton followed [my]47-hareton example , and left [the room]243-the room , but presently re - appeared , bearing half - a - dozen volumes in [his]47-hareton hands , which [he]47-hareton threw into [Catherine]56-catherine 's lap , exclaiming , "[47-hareton] Take them ! [I]0-i never want to hear , or read , or think of them again ! " "[0-i] [I]0-i wo nt have them , now ! " [she]56-catherine answered . "[0-i] [I]0-i shall connect them with [you]0-i , and hate [them]2375-them . " [She]56-catherine opened one that had obviously been often turned over , and read a portion in the drawling tone of [a beginner]4786-a beginner ; then laughed , and threw it from [her]56-catherine . "[0-i] And listen ! " [she]56-catherine continued provokingly , commencing a verse of an old ballad in the same fashion . But [his]47-hareton self - love would endure no further torment — [I]0-i heard , and not altogether disapprovingly , a manual check given to [her]56-catherine saucy tongue — [The little wretch]787-the little wretch had done [her]56-catherine utmost to hurt [[her]56-catherine cousin]462-her cousin 's sensitive though uncultivated feelings , and a physical argument was the only mode [he]47-hareton had of balancing the account and repaying its effects on [the inflicter]4789-the inflicter . [He]47-hareton afterwards gathered the books and hurled them on the fire . [I]0-i read in [his]47-hareton countenance what anguish it was to offer that sacrifice to spleen — [I]0-i fancied that as they consumed , [he]47-hareton recalled the pleasure they had already imparted ; and the triumph , and ever increasing pleasure [he]47-hareton had anticipated from [them]2375-them — and [I]0-i fancied , [I]0-i guessed the incitement to [his]47-hareton secret studies , also . [He]47-hareton had been content with daily labour and rough animal enjyoments , till [Catherine]56-catherine crossed [his]47-hareton path — Shame at [her]56-catherine scorn , and hope of [her]56-catherine approval were [his]47-hareton first prompters to higher pursuits ; and instead of guarding [him]47-hareton from one , and winning [him]47-hareton the other , [his]47-hareton endeavours to raise [himself]47-hareton had produced just the contrary result . "[0-i] Yes , that 's all the good that such a brute as [you]2376-you can get from [them]2377-them ! " cried [Catherine]56-catherine , sucking [her]56-catherine damaged lip , and watching the conflagration with indignant eyes . "[2376-you] [You]2376-you 'd better hold [your]2376-you tongue , now ! " [he]47-hareton answered fiercely . And [his]47-hareton agitation precluding further speech , [he]47-hareton advanced hastily to the entrance , where [I]2376-you made way for [him]47-hareton to pass . But , ere [he]47-hareton had crossed the door - stones , [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff , coming up [the causeway]178-the causeway , encountered [him]47-hareton and laying hold of [his]47-hareton shoulder , asked . "[2376-you] What 's to do now , [[my]0-i lad]677-my lad ? " "[2376-you] Naught , naught ! " [he]47-hareton said , and broke away , to enjoy [his]47-hareton grief and anger in solitude . [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff gazed after [him]47-hareton , and sighed . "[2376-you] It will be odd , if [I]0-i thwart [myself]0-i ! " [he]0-i muttered , unconscious that [I]0-i was behind [him]0-i . "[0-i] But , when [I]0-i look for [[his]677-my lad father]518-his father in [his]677-my lad face , [I]0-i find [her]518-his father every day more ! How the devil is [he]677-my lad so like ? [I]0-i can hardly bear to see [him]677-my lad . " [He]0-i bent [his]0-i eyes to the ground , and walked moodily in . There was a restless , anxious expression in [his]0-i countenance , [I]677-my lad had never remarked there before , and [he]0-i looked sparer in person . [[His]0-i daughter - in - law]2712-his daughter - in - law on perceiving [him]0-i through the window , immediately escaped to [the kitchen]194-the kitchen , so that [I]677-my lad remained alone . "[677-my lad] [I]0-i 'm glad to see [you]0-i out of doors again , [Mr. Lockwood]44-mr. lockwood , " [he]0-i said in reply to [my]44-mr. lockwood greeting , "[44-mr. lockwood] from selfish motives partly , [I]0-i do n't think [I]0-i could readily supply [your]0-i loss in this desolation . [I]0-i 've wondered , more than once , what brought [you]0-i [here]2574-here . " "[0-i] An idle whim , [I]0-i fear [sir]2571-sir , " was [my]2571-sir answer , "[2571-sir] or else an idle whim is going to spirit [me]0-i away — [I]0-i shall set out for [London]6-london , next week , and [I]0-i must give [you]0-i warning , that [I]0-i feel no disposition to retain [Thrushcross Grange]73-mr. linton , beyond the twelvemonths [I]0-i agreed to rent [it]73-mr. linton . [I]0-i believe [I]0-i shall not live [there]2637-there any more . " Oh , indeed ! [you]0-i 're tired of being banished from [the world]267-the world , are [you]0-i ? "[2571-sir] [he]2571-sir said . " But , if [you]0-i be coming to plead off paying for a place , [you]0-i wo n't occupy , [your]0-i journey is useless — [I]2571-sir never relent in exacting [my]2571-sir due , from any one . "[2571-sir] " [I]0-i 'm coming to plead off nothing about it ! "[0-i] [I]0-i exclaimed , considerably irritated . " Should [you]2571-sir wish it , [I]0-i 'll settle with [you]2571-sir now , "[0-i] and [I]0-i drew [my]0-i notebook from [my]0-i pocket . " No , no , "[2571-sir] [he]2571-sir replied coolly , " [you]0-i 'll leave sufficient behind , to cover [your]0-i debts , if [you]0-i fail to return . . .I'm not in such a hurry — sit down and take [your]0-i dinner with [us]4794-us — [a guest that is safe from repeating [his]4795-a guest that is safe from repeating his visit visit]4795-a guest that is safe from repeating his visit , can generally be made welcome — [Catherine]56-catherine ! bring the things in — where are [you]0-i ? "[2571-sir] [Catherine]56-catherine re - appeared , bearing a tray of knives and forks . " [You]0-i may get [your]0-i dinner with [Joseph]45-joseph , "[56-catherine] muttered [Heathcliff]43-heathcliff aside , " and remain in [the kitchen]194-the kitchen till [he]45-joseph is gone . "[56-catherine] [She]56-catherine obeyed [his]2571-sir directions very punctually — perhaps [she]56-catherine had no temptation to transgress . Living among [clowns]2383-clowns and [misanthropists]2384-misanthropists , [she]56-catherine probably can not appreciate a better class of [people]445-people , when [she]56-catherine meets [them]445-people . With [Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff , [grim and saturnine]2386-grim and saturnine , on one hand , and [Hareton]47-hareton absolutely dumb , on the other , [I]0-i made a somewhat cheerless meal , and bid adieu early — [I]0-i would have departed by the back way to get a last glimpse of [Catherine]56-catherine , and annoy [old Joseph]45-joseph ; but [Hareton]47-hareton received orders to lead up [my]0-i horse , and [[my]0-i host]2621-my host [himself]2621-my host escorted [me]0-i to the door , so [I]0-i could not fulfil [my]0-i wish . " How dreary life gets over in [that house]4506-that house ! "[0-i] [I]0-i reflected , while riding down [the road]2638-the road . " What a realization of something more romantic than a fairy tale it would have been for [Mrs. Linton Heathcliff]48-mrs. linton , had [she]48-mrs. linton and [I]0-i struck up an attachment , as [[her]48-mrs. linton good nurse]4798-her good nurse desired , and migrated together , into the stirring atmosphere of [the town]4799-the town ! "[0-i] 1802.—This September , [I]0-i was invited to devastate [the moors of [a friend]520-a friend , in [the North]41-the north]2389-the moors of a friend , in the north ; and , on [my]0-i journey to [[his]520-a friend abode]2391-his abode , [I]0-i unexpectedly came within fifteen miles of [Gimmerton]14-gimmerton . [The hostler]2392-the hostler , at [a roadside public - house]2393-a roadside public - house , was holding a pail of water to refresh [my]0-i horses , when a cart of very green oats , newly reaped , passed by , and [he]2392-the hostler remarked — " Yon 's frough [Gimmerton]14-gimmerton , nah ! [They]4800-they 're alias three wick ' after [other folk]4801-other folk wi ' ther harvest . "[2392-the hostler] " [Gimmerton]14-gimmerton ? "[0-i] [I]0-i repeated , [[my]0-i residence in [that locality]2395-that locality]2394-my residence in that locality had already grown dim and dreamy . " Ah ! [I]0-i know ! How far is it from this ? "[0-i] " Happen [fourteen mile ' o'er th ' hills]4802-fourteen mile ' o'er th ' hills , and [a rough road]4803-a rough road , "[2392-the hostler] [he]2392-the hostler answered . A sudden impulse seized [me]0-i to visit [Thrushcross Grange]73-mr. linton . It was scarcely noon , and [I]0-i conceived that [I]0-i might as well pass the night under [my]0-i own roof , as in [an inn]2396-an inn . Besides , [I]0-i could spare a day easily , to arrange matters with [[my]0-i landlord]168-my landlord , and thus save [myself]0-i the trouble of invading [the neighbourhood]3573-the neighbourhood again . Having rested a while , [I]0-i directed [[my]0-i servant]2399-my servant to inquire the way to [the village]1197-the village ; and , with great fatigue to [our]2401-our beasts , [we]2401-our managed the distance in some three hours . [I]0-i left [him]2392-the hostler there , and proceeded down [the valley]3650-the valley alone . [The grey church]2403-the grey church looked greyer , and [the lonely churchyard]2404-the lonely churchyard lonelier . [I]0-i distinguished a moor sheep cropping the short turf on the graves . It was sweet , warm weather — too warm for travelling ; but the heat did not hinder [me]0-i from enjoying the delightful scenery above and below ; had [I]0-i seen [it]2405-it nearer August , [I]0-i 'm sure it would have tempted [me]0-i to waste a month among [its]2405-it solitudes . In winter , nothing more dreary , in summer , nothing more divine , than [those glens shut in by hills]2406-those glens shut in by hills , and [those bluff , bold swells of heath]2407-those bluff , bold swells of heath . [I]0-i reached [the Grange]73-mr. linton before sunset , and knocked for admittance ; but [the family]335-the family had retreated into [the back premises]2409-the back premises , [I]0-i judged by one thin , blue wreath curling from the kitchen chimney , and [they]335-the family did not hear . [I]0-i rode into [the court]180-the court . Under [the porch]535-the porch , [a girl of nine or ten]2412-a girl of nine or ten , sat knitting , and [an old woman]2413-an old woman reclined on the horse - steps , smoking a meditative pipe . " Is [Mrs. Dean]71-mrs. dean within ? "[0-i] [I]0-i demanded of [the dame]2879-the dame . " [Mistress Dean]162-mistress dean ? Nay ! "[2879-the dame] [she]2879-the dame answered , " shoo does n't bide [here]2574-here ; shoe 's up at [th ' Heights]4805-th ' heights . "[2879-the dame] " Are [you]2879-the dame [the housekeeper]240-the housekeeper , then ? "[0-i] [I]0-i continued . " [Eea]4807-eea , [Aw]107-aw keep th ' hause , "[2879-the dame] [she]2879-the dame replied . " Well , [I]2879-the dame 'm [Mr. Lockwood]44-mr. lockwood , [the master]430-the master — Are there any [rooms to lodge]4809-rooms to lodge [me]2879-the dame in , [I]2879-the dame wonder ? [I]2879-the dame wish to stay [here]2574-here all night "[2879-the dame] " [T ' maister]3539-t ' maister ! "[2879-the dame] [she]2879-the dame cried in astonishment , " Whet , whoiver knew [yah]3539-t ' maister wur coming ? [Yah]3539-t ' maister sud ha ' send word ! [They]4812-they 's nowt norther dry — nor mensful abaht t ' place — nowt there is n't ! ' [She]2879-the dame threw down [her]2879-the dame pipe and bustled in , [the girl]739-the girl followed , and [I]2879-the dame entered too ; soon perceiving that [her]2879-the dame report was true , and , moreover , that [I]2879-the dame had almost upset [her]2879-the dame wits by [my]2879-the dame unwelcome apparition . [I]2879-the dame bid [her]2879-the dame be composed — [I]2879-the dame would go out for a walk ; and , meantime , [she]2879-the dame must try to prepare a corner of [a sitting - room]4814-a sitting - room for [me]2879-the dame to sup in , and a [bed - room to sleep in]4815-bed - room to sleep in — No sweeping and dusting , only good fires and dry sheets were necessary . [She]2879-the dame seemed willing to do [her]2879-the dame best ; though [she]2879-the dame thrust the hearth - brush into the grates in mistake for the poker ; and mal - appropriated several other articles of [her]2879-the dame craft ; but [I]2879-the dame retired , confiding in [her]2879-the dame energy for a resting - place against [my]2879-the dame return . [Wuthering Heights]11-wuthering heights was the goal of [my]2879-the dame proposed excursion . An after - thought brought [me]2879-the dame back , when [I]2879-the dame had quitted [the court]180-the court . "[2879-the dame] All well at [the Heights]11-wuthering heights ? " [I]2879-the dame enquired of [the woman]1617-the woman . "[2879-the dame] Eea , f'r owt [Ee knaw]163-ee knaw ! " [she]1617-the woman answered , skurrying away with a pan of hot cinders . [I]163-ee knaw would have asked why [Mrs. Dean]71-mrs. dean had deserted [the Grange]2656-the grange ; but it was impossible to delay [her]2879-the dame at such a crisis , so , [I]163-ee knaw turned away and made [my]163-ee knaw exit , rambling leisurely along with the glow of a sinking sun behind , and the mild glory of a rising moon in front ; one fading , and the other brightening , as [I]163-ee knaw quitted [the park]2652-the park , and climbed [the stony by - road]4820-the stony by - road branching off to [[Mr. Heathcliff]43-heathcliff 's dwelling]183-mr. heathcliff 's dwelling . Before [I]163-ee knaw arrived in sight of [it]183-mr. heathcliff 's dwelling , all that remained of day was a beamless , amber light along the west ; but [I]163-ee knaw could see every pebble on [the path]4017-the path , and every blade of grass by that splendid moon . [I]163-ee knaw had neither to climb the gate , nor to knock — it yielded to [my]163-ee knaw hand . That is an improvement ! [I]163-ee knaw thought . And [I]163-ee knaw noticed another , by the aid of [my]163-ee knaw nostrils ; a fragrance of stocks and wall flowers , wafted on the air , from amongst the homely fruit trees . Both doors and lattices were open ; and , yet , as is usually the case in [a coal district]4823-a coal district , a fine , red fire illumined the chimney ; the comfort which the eye derives from it , renders the extra heat endurable . But [the house of Wuthering Heights]4824-the house of wuthering heights is so large , that [the inmates]4825-the inmates have plenty of space for withdrawing out of [its]4824-the house of wuthering heights influence ; and , accordingly , what [inmates there]4826-inmates there were had stationed [themselves]4826-inmates there not far from one of the windows . [I]163-ee knaw could both see [them]4826-inmates there and hear [them]4826-inmates there talk before [I]163-ee knaw entered ; and , looked and listened in consequence , being moved thereto by a mingled sense of curiosity , and envy that grew as [I]163-ee knaw lingered . "[163-ee knaw] Con - trary ! " said a voice , as sweet as a silver bell—"That[2415-you] for the third time , [you]2415-you dunce ! [I]0-i 'm not going to tell [you]2415-you , again — Recollect , or [I]0-i pull [your]2415-you hair ! " "[0-i] Contrary , then , " answered [another]4827-another , in deep , but softened tones . And now , kiss [me]0-i , for minding so well . "[0-i] " No , read it over first correctly , without a single mistake . "[2416-the male speaker] [The male speaker]2416-the male speaker began to read — [he]2416-the male speaker was [a young man]3215-a young man , respectably dressed , and seated at a table , having a book before [him]2416-the male speaker . [His]2416-the male speaker handsome features glowed with pleasure , and [his]2416-the male speaker eyes kept impatiently wandering from the page to a small white hand over [his]2416-the male speaker shoulder , which recalled [him]2416-the male speaker by a smart slap on the cheek , whenever [its owner]491-its owner detected such signs of inattention . [Its owner]491-its owner stood behind ; [her]491-its owner light shining ringlets blending , at intervals , with [his]2416-the male speaker brown locks , as [she]491-its owner bent to superintend [his]2416-the male speaker studies ; and [her]491-its owner face — it was lucky [he]2416-the male speaker could not see [her]491-its owner face , or [he]2416-the male speaker would never have been so steady — [I]0-i could , and [I]0-i bit [my]0-i lip , in spite , at having thrown away the chance [I]0-i might have had , of doing something besides staring at its smiting beauty . The task was done , not free from further blunders , but [the pupil]2420-the pupil claimed a reward and received , at least five kisses , which , however , [he]2420-the pupil generously returned . Then , [they]2421-they came to the door , and from [their]2421-they conversation , [I]0-i judged [they]2421-they were about to issue out and have a walk on [the moors]352-the moors . [I]0-i supposed [I]0-i should be condemned in [Hareton Earashaw]164-hareton 's heart , if not by [his]2416-the male speaker mouth , to [the lowest pit in [the infernal regions]1523-the infernal regions]2423-the lowest pit in the infernal regions if [I]0-i showed [[my]0-i unfortunate person]2425-my unfortunate person in [[his]2416-the male speaker neighbourhood]2426-his neighbourhood then , and feeling very mean and malignant , [I]0-i skulked round to seek refuge in [the kitchen]194-the kitchen . [There]2637-there , was unobstructed admittance on that side also ; and , at the door , sat [[my]0-i old friend]2429-my old friend , [Nelly Dean]80-ellen , sewing and singing a song , which was often interrupted from within , by harsh words of scorn and intolerance , uttered in far from musical accents . " Aw'd rayther , by th ' haulf , [hev]4828-hev ['em]4828-hev swearing [i]2430-the tenant of the kitchen ' [my]2430-the tenant of the kitchen lugs frough morn tuh neeght , nur hearken [yah]4829-yah , [hahsiver]4830-hahsiver ! "[2430-the tenant of the kitchen] said [the tenant of [the kitchen]194-the kitchen]2430-the tenant of the kitchen , in answer to an unheard speech of [Nelly]80-ellen 's . " It 's a blazing shaime , ut Aw cannut oppen t ' Blessed Book , bud [yah]4829-yah set up them glories tuh sattan , un ' all t ' flay some wickednesses ut iver wer born intuh t ' warld ! Oh ! yah're a raight nowt ; un ' shoo 's another ; un ' [that poor lad]4831-that poor lad ' ull be lost , atween [ye]4829-yah . [Poor lad]1529-poor lad ! "[2430-the tenant of the kitchen] [he]2430-the tenant of the kitchen added , with a groan ; " [he]4831-that poor lad 's witched , Aw'm sartin on't ! "[2432-the singer] [Mrs. Dean]71-mrs. dean was about to recommence , when [I]0-i advanced , and recognising [me]0-i directly , [she]71-mrs. dean jumped to [her]71-mrs. dean feet , crying — " Why , bless [you]4837-old man , [Mr. Lockwood]44-mr. lockwood !
